Did she come here to relax?	她来这里放松的吗？
Did you bring a hair dryer?	你有带吹风机吗？
Do what you think is right.	做你认为正确的事。
Do you belong to any clubs?	您隶属哪家俱乐部吗？
Do you drink a lot of milk?	你喝很多牛奶吗？
Do you have a black jacket?	你有一件黑夹克吗？
Do you have a color TV set?	你有彩色电视机吗？
Do you have to make dinner?	你必须做晚饭吗？
Do you know a good dentist?	你有认识好的牙医吗？
Do you know where he lives?	你知道他住在哪里吗？
Do you like Mozart's music?	你喜欢莫扎特的音乐吗？
Do you often hear from him?	你常常收到他的音讯吗？
Do you often travel abroad?	你经常去国外旅行吗？
Do you plan to go overseas?	你打算出国吗？
Do you think that was fair?	你认为那公平吗？
Don't beat around the bush.	不要拐弯抹角。
Don't neglect minor issues.	不要忽略枝节问题。
Don't tell anyone our plan.	不要把我们的计划告诉任何人。
Don't trample on the grass.	不要践踏草地。
Don't try to intimidate me.	别想吓唬我。
Don't worry about the past.	不要担心过去。
Don't you want to know why?	你不想知道为什么吗？
Drop the hammer down to me.	把锤子扔给我.
Ebony is a hard black wood.	黑檀树是一种黑色而坚硬的树木。
Electricity is very useful.	电很有用。
English is not easy for me.	英语对我来说并不容易。
English is not spoken here.	这里的人不说英语。
Fatty food; fatty deposits.	脂肪食品；脂肪沉淀
Fill the bucket with water.	把水装满桶子。
Four quarters make a whole.	四个四分之一可构成一个整体.
French is my mother tongue.	法语是我的母语。
Fruit trees; fruit growers.	果树；果树栽培者
Give credit where it's due.	该表扬就给予表扬.
Give me a light, would you?	借个火，好吗?
Guess who I ran into today.	你猜我今天碰见谁了.
Hamlet goes off stage left.	哈姆雷特从舞台左侧退下。
Hang your coat on the hook.	把你的外套挂在钩子上。
Have the pigs been fed yet?	猪已喂过了吗?
Have you ever visited Rome?	你去过罗马吗？
He acknowledged his faults.	他得知了他的错误。
He affected not to hear me.	他假装没有听见我。
He ate a box of chocolates.	他吃了一盒巧克力。
He ate a whole tin of stew.	他吃了整整一听炖肉.
He brought his lunch today.	他今天带了午饭。
He can read English easily.	他能轻松地读英语。
He decided to quit smoking.	他决定戒烟了。
He deserved to be punished.	他应当受到惩罚。
He even called me an idiot.	他甚至叫你傻瓜。
He fall sick the other day.	前几天他得病了。
He gave her a short answer.	他给了她一个简短生硬的回答.
He had a smile on his face.	他面带笑容。
He had an accident at work.	他在工作中出了意外。
He has a pair of overshoes.	他有一双套鞋。
He has an eye for antiques.	他对古董很有鉴赏力。
He has diplomatic immunity.	他有外交豁免权。
He hurts her with the hilt.	他用剑柄碰伤她了。
He intruded on her privacy.	他侵犯了她的隐私。
He invited us to the party.	他邀请我们参加晚会。
He is a dishonest merchant.	他是一个不诚实的商人。
He is an expert at fishing.	他是个钓鱼专家。
He is keen on table-tennis.	他爱好打乒乓球。
He is wearing a black suit.	他穿着一套黑西装。
He is weary with hard work.	他因艰苦的工作而疲倦。
He likes to throw the bull.	他喜欢吹牛。
He lives on the east coast.	他住在东部海岸地区.
He looks like a clever boy.	他看起来像是个聪明的男孩。
He may have left for Kyoto.	他可能已经离开京都了。
He mustered all the troops.	他召集了所有的部队.
He occasionally visited me.	他偶尔会来拜访我。
He often shows up at balls.	他经常出入于舞会。
He often suffers from cold.	他经常患感冒。
He painted his bicycle red.	他把他的自行车刷成红色。
He ranks high as a scholar.	他是第一流的学者。
He said hello to the woman.	他向那位女士问好。
He said, "I'm from Canada."	他说：“我是加拿大来的。”
He saw a dog near the door.	他在门附近看到了一只狗。
He sent me a birthday card.	他寄给我一张生日贺卡。
He shaved his mustache off.	他刮了他的胡子。
He shot her a sharp glance.	他对她投以锐利的眼光。
He speaks English a little.	他说一点英语。
He struck me with his fist.	他用拳头打我.
He studied English history.	他学了英国历史。
He studies Chinese as well.	他也学习汉语。
He told me to wash my face.	他叫我洗脸。
He took us back in his car.	他开车送我们回来的。
He turned pale with fright.	他吓得脸色发白。
He was almost hit by a car.	他差点被一辆汽车撞上了。
He was anything but a hero.	他绝不是一个英雄。
He was every inch drenched.	他浑身湿透。
He was in a hurry to leave.	他急切地要离开。
He was inflamed with anger.	他满腔怒火。
He was noted for his vigor.	他以精力充沛而出名。
He was paid 10,000 dollars.	有人付给他10000美元。
He was softened into tears.	他被感动得流下了眼泪。
He winked at her knowingly.	他会心地向她眨了眨眼.
He won renown as a pianist.	他赢得钢琴家的声誉。
He writes with penetration.	他写的文章尖锐深刻。
He's a high school student.	他是一名高中学生。
He's much younger than Tom.	他比Tom年轻得多。
He's staying at his aunt's.	他呆在他阿姨家。
He's writing a long letter.	他写长信。
Her dress caught on a nail.	她的衣服让钉子给钩住了。
Her face registered dismay.	她脸上流露出惊慌的神色
Her singing was perfection.	她的歌唱得已是炉火纯青.
Her talents are well known.	人人都知道她很有才干.
His behaviour seemed queer.	他的举动似乎有些古怪.
His breath smelt of garlic.	他呼出的气中有蒜味.
His business is prosperous.	他的事业兴旺发达。
His character is indulgent.	他性格放纵。
His letter makes me uneasy.	他的来信让我不安。
His resolve began to waver.	他的决心开始动摇了
His wound became festering.	他的伤口在溃烂。

I paid about fifty dollars.	我花了大约五十美元。
I play the tenor saxophone.	我吹次中音萨克斯风。

I objected to his paying the bill.	我反对他付帐单。

I personally see him taking money.	我亲眼看见他拿了钱。

I played with the baby on my knee.	我在膝盖上跟婴儿玩。

I prefer working to doing nothing.	我宁愿工作也不愿闲著。
I read about him in the newspaper.	我在报纸上读到有关他的消息。

They planted many yews in the park.	他们在公园里种了许多紫杉。

They say that old house is haunted.	据说老房子闹鬼。

He called his mother"old girl", too.	他还管他母亲叫“老太婆”呢。
He cleaned the car with an oily rag.	他用一块沾油的抹布擦干净汽车。
He comes from a long line of actors.	他出生于一个历史悠久的演员世家。
He couldn't understand the sentence.	他无法理解这句话。
He demonstrated a mastery of Arabic.	他显示了对阿拉伯语的精通。
He devises a new type of transistor.	他发明了一种新的晶体管。
He doesn't have a job. He's retired.	他没有工作，他退休了。
He exhausted himself in the attempt.	他因十分努力而筋疲力尽.
He felt a dull ache in his shoulder.	他感到肩膀隐隐作痛。

He gave me a nice Christmas present.	他给了我一个很棒的圣诞礼物。
He gave me a reasonable explanation.	他对我作了合理的解释。
He gave the news out in grave voice.	他用庄重的声音宣布这一消息。

He got the better of his classmates.	他胜过他班中的同学。
He grew increasingly to rely on her.	他越来越依赖她了.
He has an inflammation of the lungs.	他得了肺炎。
He has been an invalid all his life.	他终身残废.
He has been to Hawaii several times.	他去过夏威夷几次。
He has chosen the most direct route.	他选取了最直的路线。
He has gone to Italy to study music.	他已经去义大利学习音乐了。
He has the makings of a good doctor.	他具有成为一名好医生的素质。
He has to appease his young brother.	他不得不迁就他的弟弟。
He hit the tennis ball over the net.	他把网球打过了网。
He is 5 centimeters taller than her.	他比她高5公分。

He is afraid of getting lung cancer.	他怕得到肺癌。
He is as clever as (he is) handsome.	他不但英俊而且聪明。

He is good at dealing with children.	他擅长应付小孩子。

He made good use of the opportunity.	他好好地利用了这个机会。

He made the most of his opportunity.	他尽力地利用了这个机会。
He observes keenly, but says little.	他观察敏锐, 但是很少说话.
He opened his eyes wide in surprise.	他吃惊地睁大了眼睛。

He pushed the stool under the table.	他把凳子推到桌子下面。

He said, "I want to be a scientist."	他说：“我想成为科学家。”

She made the same mistake as before.	她犯了和以前同样的错误。

Do you know anything about Tom's parents?	你知道任何关于汤姆父母的事吗？
Do you know which road leads to my house?	你知道哪一条路到我家吗?
Do you know why she is so strange to him?	你知道她为什么对他如此冷淡吗？
Do you like to play chess [table tennis]?	你爱下棋[打乒乓球]吗？
Do you remember the reading on the table?	你记得表上的读数吗？
Do you think he is good for the position?	你认为他适合这个职位吗？
Do you think we'll make Oxford by midday?	我们中午能到牛津吗?
Don't be angry over such trivial matters.	别为这些琐事生气。
Don't be too confidential with strangers.	不要过份相信陌生人。
Don't bother to dress up come as you are.	用不著穿讲究衣服－－就穿平常的衣服来吧。
Don't confuse Austria and/with Australia.	不要把奥地利跟澳大利亚弄混淆了.
Don't stand on ceremony. I'm no stranger.	别客气，我又不是外人。
Don't stoop to quarrel with her about it.	别降低身份为这事去跟她争吵。
Every miller draws water to his own mill.	人人为自己的利益着想或行事。
Every spring the river floods the valley.	每年春天河水把山谷淹没。
Everybody is immune to smallpox nowadays.	现今每个人都对天花免疫了。
Everyone knew Tom was the one who did it.	大家都知道是汤姆做的
Everything about Chinese food is refined.	中国菜在每一方面都是精美的。
Excessively nervous or excited; agitated.	紧张过度的或兴奋过度的；紧张的
Extra work kept him (late) at the office.	他因有额外的工作, （很晚）仍留在办公室里.
Father walks to his office every morning.	爸爸每天早上走路去上班。
February is the second month of the year.	二月是一年的第二个月份.
Fish and red wine don't go well together.	鱼和红酒不合。
Follow the railroad track about100 meter.	顺着铁路走大约100公尺。
Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.	初生之犊不畏虎。
Frankly speaking, I don't agree with you.	实话说，我不赞成你。
Give him an inch and he will take a yard.	【谚】得寸进尺。
Give me a chance to make you proud of me.	给我机会来让你为我感到自豪。
Greece is located in the south of Europe.	希腊位于欧洲南部。
Hanging back or falling behind; dilatory.	畏缩不前的或落后的；迟误拖拉的
Harboring criminals is an offence in law.	窝藏罪犯是犯法的。
Have you fixed on a date for the wedding?	你们选定结婚日期了吗?
He achieved because he was a hard worker.	他之所以成功是因为他工作勤奋。
He advised them how to stop the invasion.	他给他们出主意怎样制止侵略。
He always leads up to his favorite topic.	他总是把话头引到他得意的话题上去。
He applied himself to the study of music.	他潜心研究音乐。
He ate the plum, and threw the core away.	他吃掉了李子，并扔掉了果核。
He beckoned to me from across the street.	他在马路对面向我招手致意。
He bent over backward to please his wife.	他竭尽全力地讨好他老婆。
He did everything he could for his child.	他为自己的孩子能做的都做了。
He doesn't have any friends to play with.	他没有任何朋友玩。
He enticed the young girl away from home.	他把那小女孩诱惑得离开了家.
He gave correct answers to the questions.	他对这个问题给了正确的答案。
He grudges her earning more than he does.	他嫉妒她挣的比他多.
He had been courting Jane for six months.	他追求简已有六个月之久.
He has a rough outside, but a good heart.	他外表粗鲁，心地善良。
He has come over to China for the summer.	他不远万里来中国度暑假。
He has never dissatisfied with this plan.	他从来没有对计划表示不满。
He has published quite a lot of articles.	他发表了不少文章。
He hoisted the package over his shoulder.	他把包裹扛上了肩。
He hurried so he wouldn't miss the train.	汤姆加紧步伐以不错过火车。
He hurriedly left the office as if angry.	他急匆匆地走出办公室，好象很生气的样子。
He is a member of the medical fraternity.	他在医务界工作。
He is a regular worshiper at that church.	他常去那个教堂做礼拜。
He is expected to win the game with ease.	预计他在比赛中会轻易获胜。
He is giving his whole attention to that.	他全神贯注。
He is studying at a junior middle school.	他正在上初中。
He is the elder statesman par excellence.	他是最优秀的年长的国务活动家.
He joined us in the discussion yesterday.	他昨天参加了我们的讨论。
He left the house without saying goodbye.	他没说再见就离开了房子。
He likes playing jokes on his classmates.	他喜欢拿他的同学开玩笑。
He made for the door and tried to escape.	他向门口走去, 企图逃跑。
He makes friends with everybody he meets.	他跟所有他遇见的人交朋友。
He must needs go away when he was wanted.	要找他时，他偏偏不在。
He often sits by me and listens to music.	他经常坐在我旁边听音乐。
He oscillates between political extremes.	他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定.
He paid scant attention to what was said.	他没怎么听讲。
He pats his face dry (with a hand towel).	他（用手巾）轻轻把脸拍乾.
He plays golf two or three times a month.	他一个月玩两到三次高尔夫。
He put the key in the lock and turned it.	他把钥匙插入锁里转动。
He rationed out the water to the sailors.	他按定量发水给水手们。
He read us a sonnet that celebrates love.	他给我们读了一首歌颂爱情的十四行诗。
He redeemed several coupons at the store.	他从商店里得到了几张优惠券。
He said he'd love her to the end of time.	他说天长地久永远爱她。
He scanned the horizon, looking for land.	他细看天水相连的地方, 寻找陆地.
He scored 48 points in last night's game.	他在昨晚的比赛中独得了48分。
He sent his car to the garage for repair.	他把汽车送到修车厂修理。
He undertook to finish the job by Friday.	他答应星期五之前完成这项工作。
He was awarded a cash bounty by his boss.	他的上司奖给他一笔现金。
He was impudent enough to call me a fool.	他无礼至极，竟然叫我傻瓜。
He was inclined to give them a free hand.	他倾向于放手让他们干。
He was kind enough to lend me some money.	他够大方，借了我一点钱。
He was struck dumb by her sharp question.	他被她那尖锐的问题弄得哑口无言。
He went to Italy in order to study music.	为了研读音乐他去了义大利。
He wrote a book about a jungle adventure.	他写了一本关于丛林冒险的书。
He wrote down the outline of his lecture.	他写下演讲的提纲。
He's a staunch supporter of the monarchy.	他是君主制的坚定拥护者。
He's been ill and isn't fit for work yet.	他一直在生病，尚不能工作。
He's now fully recovered from his stroke.	他现已从中风病完全康复了。
Her hair hung down her back to her waist.	她的长发披在後背直垂到腰间.
Her intelligence seems almost superhuman.	她很聪明, 可谓才智超人.
Her motherland is in the tropical region.	她的祖国位于热带地区。
Her novel is a satire on social snobbery.	她的小说是描写势利小人的讽刺作品.
High-test gasoline will soup up your car.	你的车子使用高级汽油可以增大马力。
His boundless generosity moved us deeply.	他的无限的慷慨深深地感动了我们。
His charges were met with cries of anger.	他的指控遭到一阵愤怒的反对声。
His childhood was repressed and solitary.	他的童年是压抑而孤独的。

His generosity to the poor is well known.	他对穷人的慷慨为人所熟知。
His only reaction was a pregnant silence.	他唯一的反应是一阵意味深长的沉默
His polite manners bespoke the gentleman.	他那彬彬有礼的举止显出他是个绅士.
His shaking hands showed his inward fear.	他颤抖的双手显示出他内心的恐惧。
His view of life is different from yours.	他的人生观与你的不同。

I didn't participate in the conversation.	我没有参与这个谈话。

I don't have the strength to keep trying.	我没力气继续尝试了。

If I don't go now, I will miss the train.	如果我现在不走，就赶不上火车了。

Put the following sentences into English.	把下列句子翻译成英文。
Quakers strongly oppose violence and war.	教友派信徒们强烈反对暴力和战争。
Sam bent his brows upon hearing the news.	萨姆听了这消息后紧皱眉头。
Saturday afternoons go by like lightning!	星期六的下午象闪电一样转瞬即逝!
Saving the child's life was a heroic act.	抢救那孩子的生命是英勇的行为。
School finishes before noon on Saturdays.	学校在星期六中午之前放学。
Several of the accused were found guilty.	被告中有数人被判定有罪。
Share prices tumbled on the stock-market.	股市上股票价格暴跌.
She always clears the table after a meal.	她经常在饭后收拾桌子。
She and I were contemporaries at college.	她和我在学院里是同学。
She attacked him with a torrent of abuse.	她用连珠炮似的谩骂来攻击他。
She buy an electric toaster this morning.	今天上午她买了一个烤面包片的电炉。
She cared for her father until his death.	她照顾她的父亲直到他去世。
She does her work with tremendous vigour.	她工作起来干劲十足.
She embroidered the cushion with flowers.	她把垫子绣上了花.
She esteemed that she knew what life was.	她认为自己懂得什么是生活。
She finished her work an hour in advance.	她提前一小时完成了工作。
She gave away state secrets to the enemy.	她将国家机密泄露给敌人了.
She gave me a diagram of railway network.	她给了我一张铁路网图解。
She got her daughter a personal computer.	她给她的女儿买了一台个人电脑。
She got married when she was twenty-five.	她二十五岁时结婚了。
She graduated from high school last year.	去年她从高中毕业了。
She has been absent since last Wednesday.	从上周三起，她一直缺席。
She has lent her name to the lofty cause.	她以自己的名义支持这一崇高的事业。
She is sweeping the soot off the chimney.	她正把烟筒里的黑灰扫掉。
She made a series of medical discoveries.	她提出了一连串的医学发现。
She often sits in the garden at twilight.	黄昏时分她常常坐在花园里。
She pasted the pictures into a scrapbook.	她把图片贴在剪贴簿上。
She refused to meet the union delegation.	她拒绝接见工会代表团.
She sat twiddling the ring on her finger.	她坐在那儿捻弄手指上的戒指.
She sets aside a bit of money every month	她每月都存一点儿钱.
She shows a spontaneous gaiety of manner.	她露出天真愉快的神态。
She smashed the hammer down onto the box.	她用锤子猛击箱子.
She soon becomes the centre of attention.	她很快成为大家注意的人物。
She spends her leisure time making dolls.	她利用空闲时间做布娃娃。
She squeezed the juice from many oranges.	她榨了许多柳橙汁。
She talked with him with sarcastic tones.	她用挖苦的语调和他说话。
She was scalded when the boiler exploded.	锅炉爆炸时她被烫伤了。
She was studying to build up her algebra.	她在学习以提高自己的代数水平。
She wore a diamond clip on her new dress.	她在新衣服上戴了一枚钻石别针。
She works so hard in spite of her illness	她带病努力工作, 真是难能可贵!
She's a gutsy player, she never gives in.	她是个勇敢的选手, 从不屈服.
Should a soldier value honour above life?	军人应视荣誉重於生命吗?
So they alleged, but have they any proof?	他们是这样宣称的，但他们有证据吗？
Soccer is the most popular of all sports.	足球是所有体育运动中最受欢迎的。
Soldiers were sent in to quell the riots.	已派士兵去镇压动乱.
Some banks tightened up on their credits.	有几家银行在信贷方面紧缩起来了。
Some furniture is put together with glue.	一些家具是用胶水黏在一起。
Sometimes the patient cried for the pain.	有时这个病人疼得哭起来。
Sorry it took me so long to write to you.	对不起, 我过了这么长的时间才回你的信。
Speaking of his lover, his eyes sparkled.	谈到他的情人时, 他的双眼闪烁着光芒。
Spring is the best season to visit Kyoto.	春天是访问京都最好的季节。
Stir the flour and milk to a stiff paste.	把面粉和牛奶搅成很稠的糊.
Stop niggling about every penny we spend.	别再为我们花的每个小钱费心思了.
Sue was troubled to see trash everywhere.	苏看到到处是垃圾很苦恼。
That man behaves like an overgrown child.	那男子一举一动像个大男孩。
The Parthenon is a magnificent structure.	帕台农神庙是一座宏伟的建筑物.
The Queen was crowned with much ceremony.	女王加冕礼仪很隆重.
The Swiss consume a large amount of beer.	瑞士人消耗不少啤酒。
The above price excludes your commission.	上述价格不包括佣金在内。
The agreement is binding on both parties.	协议对双方具有约束力。
The announcement confirmed my suspicions.	这项通告证明了我的猜疑属实.
The average snowfall here is 10cm a year.	这里年平均降雪量为10厘米.
The ball hit the wall and bounced off it.	球打在墙上又反弹回来。
The ball is that boy's prized possession.	这个球是那个男孩的宝贝。
The bird fluttered its wings in the cage.	鸟在笼中拍著翅膀.
The bird was covered with white feathers.	鸟儿身上铺满了白色的羽毛。
The blessing of the Lord be upon you all.	愿主赐福于你们大家。
The boss has a good opinion of your work.	老板对你的工作有很高的评价。
The butter will soften out of the fridge.	黄油从冰箱中取出会变软.
The captain reiterated the command to us.	上尉对我们重申了那项命令。
The car had its hazard warning lights on.	这辆汽车亮起了危险信号灯。
The car seems to have given up the ghost.	看来这汽车算是报销了。
The cast bowed as the audience applauded.	演员们向鼓掌的观众鞠躬.
The cat was run over by a truck and died.	那只猫被卡车碾死了。
The children are longing for the holidays	孩子们盼望放假.
The children were playing at keeping shop	孩子们假装开商店玩儿.
The cigarette burnt a hole in the carpet.	香烟在地毯上烧了一个窟窿.
The college I applied to has accepted me.	我报了名的学院已经录取我了.
The court awarded (him) damages of 50000.	法庭判给（他）50000英镑损害赔偿费.
The crowds concentrated round the palace.	人群汇集在宫殿的四周。
The crowds drifted away from the stadium.	人群慢慢从体育场散去.
The day after tomorrow is Tom's birthday.	后天是汤姆的生日。
The days stretch out in an endless vista.	时日在无穷的展望中延展着。
The distribution of the magazine is 2000.	该杂志的销售量为2000份。
The dress is too expensive for me to buy.	那衣服太昂贵，我买不起。
The drug has no undesirable side-effects.	这种药没有什麽不良的副作用.
The duke wrote a letter with a quill pen.	公爵用一根羽毛笔写信。
The earthquake wreaked havoc on the city.	地震对这个城市造成了大破坏。
The earthworm wriggled when I touched it.	我碰蚯蚓的时候，它扭动起来。
The election reduced the Party to a rump.	这次选举後该党已沦为微不足道的少数党.
The examiners failed half the candidates.	主考者评定半数应试者不及格.
The falling leaf spiralled to the ground.	落叶盘旋著飘到了地上.
The fire cast a ruddy glow over the city.	这场火把城市上空映得一片通红。
The fluctuating value of gold and silver.	黄金和白银的起伏不定的价格
The general handed over to the conqueror.	将军向胜利者办理了移交手续。
The government has set two refugee camps.	政府已经建了两个难民营。
The hat was decorated with colored beads.	那顶帽子上饰有彩色珠子。
The heroine of the film is an aged woman.	影片的女主角是一位老妇人。
The horse devoured the course before him.	马以极快的速度跑完它的路程。
The house I'm living in isn't very large.	我住的房子不是太大。
The house has sunk about ten centimeters.	那楝房屋下陷约十公分。
The interruption fragmented his argument.	他的辩论因被打断而显得不完整。
The invader wanted to attack our country.	侵略者妄图攻打我们国家。
The leader must be a person of authority.	领袖必须是有权威的人.
The library is in the middle of the city.	图书馆位于市中央。
The little cabin was bathed in moonlight.	小木屋沐浴在月光之中。
The male sperm fertilizes the female egg.	雄性的精子使雌性的卵子受精.
The man behind them is playing the piano.	在他们身后的男人正在弹钢琴。
The man tried to install his own antenna.	这男人试着安装他自己的天线。
The market always picks up in the spring.	一到春天市场就活跃了。
The medicine produced a violent reaction.	这药物引起了剧烈的反应.
The moon circles the earth every 28 days.	月亮每28天绕地球一圈.
The moon is shining (through the window).	月光（通过窗户）照了进来.
The movie theater was filled with people.	这家电影院挤满了人。
The museum is open from Monday to Friday.	博物馆周一到周五开门。
The need to find a solution urged him on.	亟须找出解决方法, 这是鞭策他的动力.
The negotiations have reached a deadlock.	谈判陷入僵局。
The new film will be released next month.	这部新的电影下个月发行。
The news of her death circulated quickly.	她死去的消息迅速传开。
The next concert will take place in June.	下一场音乐会将在六月份举办。
The next postal delivery is at 4 o'clock.	下一次邮递时间是四点钟。
The office mail is opened in the morning.	公务信件在早晨开启.
The old man is dropping away in the sofa.	这位老人在沙发上打起瞌睡来。
The old man kept his savings in the bank.	老人把他的储蓄存在银行里。
The only way to cure backache is to rest.	治疗背痛的唯一办法是休息。
The open door revealed an untidy kitchen.	透过敞开的房门可以看见凌乱的厨房。
The ore is smelted in this large factory.	这个大型工厂里熔炼矿石。
The photograph was backed with cardboard.	照片背面衬上了一层纸板.
The police asked me if I possessed a gun.	警察问我是否有枪。
The police officers arrested the burglar.	警察拘捕了这个窃贼。
The police persuaded the suspect to talk.	警方劝嫌疑犯招供.
The police seized various books and tapes	警方查获了各种书和磁带.
The portrait was his proudest possession.	那肖像是他最为珍贵的东西.
The possibility of suicide was ruled out.	自杀的可能性已被排除。
The prisoner paced the floor of his cell.	那犯人在牢房里来回地走著.
The quality or condition of being vulgar.	庸俗，粗俗庸俗的品质或环境
The road goes through a gap in the hills.	这条路穿过两条山脉之间的峡谷。
The room was illuminated with red lights.	这个房间被红色的灯照亮了。
The root of the problem is lack of trust.	产生这问题的根源在於缺乏信任.
The rosebush was never so flowery before.	玫瑰花从未如此盛开过。
The scene is very beautiful in this glen.	这条峡谷里的景色非常美丽。
The school was closed because of the flu.	因为流行性感冒全校停止上课。
The sheep were herded into a ragged line.	这些羊被赶在一起，排成歪歪扭扭的一行。
The ship is combating the wind and waves.	那只船正与风浪搏斗。
The ship was sunk by an atomic submarine.	这艘船是被一艘核潜艇击沉的。
The shop is open from Monday to Saturday.	这家店从星期一到星期六都营业。
The sky darkened as the storm approached.	风雨欲来, 天色黑暗.
The society's evils are worth meditative.	社会上的罪恶是值得思考的。
The soldiers are now stationed in Berlin.	那些士兵现驻扎于柏林。
The soldiers strengthened their defenses.	士兵们加强了他们的防御工事。
The sparrow is a common bird in our city.	麻雀在我们这个城市里是一种常见的鸟。
The speaker was bombarded with questions.	那位发言者遭到了连珠炮般的追问。
The station is a short walk from my house	车站到我家只有几步路的路程。
The statistics were given in parenthesis.	统计数字在括号里.
The storm didn't abate for several hours.	风暴几个小时没有减弱了。
The strike affected the nation's economy.	罢工影响了国家经济。
The students learned many poems by heart.	学生们用心学习了很多首诗。
The sums reached to a considerable total.	那几笔款子加起来总数很可观。
The sun is the ultimate source of energy.	太阳是能量的最基本来源。
The sunlight has bleached the colour out.	日光的照射使颜色变淡了。
The supermarket doors shut automatically.	超级市场的门是自动关的.
The surgeon asked him if he felt nervous.	外科医生问他是否感到紧张。
The sway of the ferry made him feel sick.	渡船摇摇晃晃, 他感到恶心.
The switch on the kettle won't stay down.	这个水壶上的开关按下时卡不住了。
The teachers praised him with one accord.	老师们异口同声地称赞他。
The terrorists have occupied the Embassy.	恐怖分子占领了大使馆.
The theater gives two performances a day.	这座剧场一天演出两场。
The thief slipped out (by the back door).	那个贼偷偷（从後门）溜出去了.
The thieves were caught in a police trap.	窃贼遭警方用计擒获.
The tomatoes have cropped well this year.	今年马铃薯丰收。
The town is dead now the mine has closed.	因矿井已关闭, 镇上一片死气沉沉.
The trees were planted at 20 ft intervals	这些树是每隔20英尺栽种一棵的.
The truth can be more painful than a lie.	真相可能比谎言更令人痛苦。
The two joints hang together pretty well.	这两个接头衔接得很好。
The washing-up had been left in the sink.	要洗的餐具都在洗涤糟里呢.
The whale dived as the harpoon struck it.	鲸鱼被鱼叉射中後潜入水中.
The witch changed the prince into a frog.	巫婆把王子变成了青蛙.
The wounded were bedded in the farmhouse.	把伤员安置在农家住宿.
The young girl aspired to be a scientist.	小女孩立志要做一名科学家。
The young girl has a pair of almond eyes.	这个年轻的姑娘长着一双杏眼。
Their conversation was full of blasphemy.	他们的谈话中充满了渎犯神灵的言词。
Their engagement is the talk of the town.	他们订婚的事成了镇上谈论的话题.
There are five spacemen in the spaceship.	宇宙飞船里有五个飞行员。
There are so many people at this concert.	这场演唱会的人真多。
There is always something happening here.	这里总有一些事情在发生。
There is no knowing what he will do next.	没有人知道他接下来会干什么。
There was an abundance of corn last year.	去年玉米丰收。
There's a book about dancing on the desk.	桌子上有一本关于舞蹈的书。
There's no money left in my bank account.	我的银行账户里没留下钱。
There's no need to get in a pet about it!	没必要为这件小事发火!
These apples are not ripe; they are sour.	这些苹果不熟，是酸的。
These criminals are the dregs of society.	这些罪犯都是社会的渣滓。
These films are suitable for adults only.	这些电影只适宜成人观看。
These flowers are beautiful, aren't they?	这些花很美，不是吗？
These marks are well above/below average.	这些分数远在一般水平以上[以下].
These pictures are really very beautiful.	这些照片真美。
These three students played truant again.	这三个学生又逃学了。
They became friends in elementary school.	他们在小学时就是朋友了。
They blamed Tom for causing the accident.	他们指责汤姆造成了事故。
They came to see me on the self-same day.	他们两人是在同一天来看我的。
They chose to pass over her rude remarks.	他们对她的粗话不予理会.
They employed him to look after the baby.	他们聘请他照料婴儿.
They emptied the biscuits onto the plate.	他们把饼干倒在盘子里。
They entered the area without permission.	他们未经许可擅入该地.
They got married and settled near Boston.	他们结了婚并定居在波士顿附近。
They left there the day before yesterday.	前天，他们离开了那儿。
They lit a fire to keep wild animals off.	他们燃起篝火防止野兽接近.
They machine-gunned the advancing troops.	他们用机枪扫射进攻的敌军.
They made straight for their destination.	他们直奔目的地。
They must have arrived home by this time.	他们在这个时候一定已经到家了。
They surrounded the yard with a palisade.	他们用篱笆把院子围起来了。
Things of that nature do not interest me.	我对那种事物不感兴趣.
This city is cold and lonely without you.	没有你这个城市孤单又冷清。
This dictionary has about 40,000 entries.	这本字典包含了约4万个词条。
This house is unfit for human habitation.	这所房子不适合人居住。
This is a good book for children to read.	这是本对儿童好的书。
This is a post office and that is a bank.	这是邮局，那是银行。
This is an ointment for burns and scalds.	这是治疗烧伤和烫伤的药膏。
This material is impervious to rainwater.	这种材料防雨。
This medicine does not have side effects.	这药没有副作用。
This tunnel is twice as long as that one.	这条隧道是那条的两倍长。
This washing machine is really a veteran.	这台洗衣机真是老古董了。
This washing machine is the latest model.	这种洗衣机是最新型产品。
Tom blew out all the candles on the cake.	汤姆吹灭了蛋糕上的所有蜡烛。
Tom bought a pair of black leather shoes.	汤姆买了一双黑色皮鞋。
Tom broke some bones in his arm and hand.	汤姆的手臂和手断了些骨头。
Tom criticized Mary in front of everyone.	汤姆在所有人面前批评了玛丽。
Tom doesn't know if Mary is happy or not.	汤姆不知道玛丽是高兴呢，还是不高兴。
Tom doesn't need to wear glasses anymore.	汤姆不需要再戴眼镜了。
Tom hasn't missed any of Mary's concerts.	汤姆没有错过一场玛丽的音乐会。
Tom hasn't talked to Mary about that yet.	汤姆还没跟玛丽谈那事。
Tom is acting as if nothing has happened.	汤姆像什么也没发生一样行动。
Tom is still sitting in the waiting room.	汤姆还在等候室里坐着。
Tom poured himself another glass of wine.	汤姆又给自己倒了一杯酒。
Tom pretty much forgot about the meeting.	汤姆差不多忘了开会的事儿。
Tom stayed at this hotel for three weeks.	汤姆在这宾馆待了三周。
Tom took out his key and opened the door.	汤姆掏出钥匙开了门。
Tom understands what it takes to survive.	汤姆明白生存的代价。
Tom was caught driving without a license.	Tom被抓到无照驾驶。
Tom wouldn't let anyone else in the room.	汤姆不让任何人进房间。
Tom's girlfriend threatened to leave him.	汤姆的女朋友威胁要离开他。
Traffic jams in the town happen everyday.	城里的交通天天堵塞。
Train services have been cut to the bone.	列车车次已大幅度减少.
Transplant the seedlings into peaty soil.	把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里.
Try to free yourself from all prejudices.	尽量消除一切偏见.
Voters have/Voting has swung to the left.	选民转而支持左派.
Vultures are picking at a lion's carcass.	秃鹫正在啄食狮子的尸体。
Wait until all the excitementhas settled.	等到激动情绪平静下来再说.
Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.	水由氢和氧组成。
Water turns into steam when it is boiled.	水沸腾后变为蒸汽。
We are well served with gas in this town.	这个城镇煤气供应得很好。
We can't go outside because it's raining.	因为下雨，我们不能出去。
We cannot see the other side of the moon.	我们看不到月亮的另一边。
We couldn't agree on a date/when to meet.	关於日期[什么时候见面], 我们未能取得一致意见.
We don't know whether he can come or not.	我们不知道他会不会来。
We express our thought by means of words.	我们用词句来表达思想。
We got up at dawn to avoid a traffic jam.	我们黎明时起床以避开交通堵塞。
We graduate from high school at eighteen.	我们在十八岁的时候从高中毕业了。
We guarantee you delivery within one day.	我们担保你在一日内收到.
We have more customers than we can count.	我们的顾客比我们可以计数的更多。
We have one of your friends here with us.	你的一个朋友在我们这里。
We have your size, but not in that color.	我们有你的尺寸，但是没有那个颜色。
We may just as well buy a new frying pan.	我们不妨买一只新煎锅。
We met her only yesterday, as it happens.	我们只是在昨天才与她偶然相遇.
We must drink to the health of the bride.	我们要为新娘的健康干杯。
We must gauge the diameter of wire first.	我们必须先测量电线的直径。
We must not forget about the grass roots.	我们绝不能忘记民众.
We must run, otherwise we'll be too late.	我们得跑著去, 要不就太晚了.
We must sleep at least eight hours a day.	我们每天至少该睡八小时。
We must stop him from seeing her somehow.	我们得想个办法阻止他和她来往。

He domineered, and the rest of us hated it.	他行事专横, 我们大家都讨厌他这种作风.
He gave the poor donkey a terrible lashing.	他狠命地抽打那头可怜的驴.
He gave us not only clothes but some money.	他不仅给了我们衣服，还有一点钱。
He got accustomed to the new way of living.	他适应了新的生活方式。
He has lived one section of miserable life.	他过了一段悲惨的生活。
He has made little progress in his English.	他的英语有了小小的进步。
He has some pretty strange political ideas.	他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。
He has three times as many books as I have.	他有我的三倍的书。
He insisted that our inference was all wet.	他硬说我们的推论完全错了。
He is a very lazy person, sleeping all day.	他非常懒惰，整天睡觉。
He is arrested for the illegal sale of gun.	他因非法贩卖枪支而被捕。
He is concerned about his father's illness.	他担心他父亲的身体。
He is one of the greatest artists in Japan.	他是日本最伟大的艺术家之一。
He is one of the greatest minds of the age.	他是当代最有才智的人.
He is richer than anyone else in this town.	他比镇里的其他人都有钱。
He is unbearable when he's in a bad temper.	他发脾气时让人无法忍受。
He jerked the fishing-rod out of the water.	他猛然从水中挑起鱼竿.
He looks as ill as he sounded on the phone.	他的样子和他在电话中说话的声音反映的病情是一样的。
He looks old, but he hasn't reached 30 yet.	他看上去老，但他还不到30岁。
He often sits for many hours reading books.	他常常坐着看书一连好几个小时。
He only entered the competition for a dare.	他只是因为受人激将才参加竞赛.
He played a delightful melody on his flute.	他用笛子吹奏了欢快的曲调。
He quotes the Bible to support his beliefs.	他引用《圣经》来支持他的信仰。
He regained his health after the operation.	手术后他恢复了健康。
He repeated several times that he was busy.	他一再说他很忙。
He seems much shorter without his shoes on.	他没穿鞋，看上去矮多了。
He speaks not only English but also French.	他不但会说英语，而且还会说法语。
He sprinkled vinegar on his fish and chips.	他把醋洒在鱼和土豆片上。
He tried to explain away the missing money.	他试图为丢失钱而进行辩解。
He wants to be a doctor or go into business	他想当医生或者经商.
He was accused of appropriating club funds.	他被控告挪用俱乐部基金.
He was booked by the referee for foul play.	他因为动作犯规而被裁判记下姓名。
He was fined for driving while intoxicated.	他因醉酒开车被罚款。
He was saddened at the memory of her death.	他想到她已死去就很难过。
He winced as she stood on his injured foot.	她踩着他受伤的脚，他疼得缩了回去。
He wore an immaculate uniform for the date.	他穿着整洁的制服去约会。
He'll be all right, he's got what it takes.	他会没事儿的，他有成功的条件。
Hemingway often writes in the first person.	海明威常用第一人称写作。
Her careful work put all the rest to shame.	她的细致工作使得其余所有的人自愧不如。
Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.	当她看到他走过来的时候，她的脸亮了起来。
Her hair grew back to it's original length.	她的头发长回原来的长度了。
Her insolence greatly displeased the judge.	她傲慢无礼, 大大地触怒了法官.
Her proposal met with continual rejections.	她的建议一再遭到拒绝。
Her tutor says she is making good progress.	她的导师说她进步很大.
Her work is a cut above that of the others.	她干的工作比别人要好些。
His account of the events was inconsistent.	他对那些事情的说法前後矛盾.
His base conduct was condemned by everyone.	他的无耻行为受到所有人的谴责。
His brain seems to be functioning normally.	他的大脑看来功能正常。
His costly mistake resulted in severe loss.	他的严重的错误导致了重大的损失。
His death is a lamentable loss of our work.	他的死对我们的工作来说是令人悲痛的损失。
His deliverance from the prison puzzled us.	他被从监狱释放使我们困惑不已。
His eyes were bloodshot from lack of sleep.	他因缺少睡眠而两眼通红.
His house is in the northeast of this city.	他的家在这个城市的东北部。
His idea received an enthusiastic response.	他的想法获得热烈的响应。
His leg had to be taken off above the knee.	他的一条腿从膝盖以上截去了.
His rash dismissal of the offer annoyed me.	他对该提议轻率的拒绝激怒了我。
His son is a soldier in a cavalry regiment.	他的儿子是骑兵团的一名战士。
His strength has diminished over the years.	经过这许多年月, 他的体力不如从前了.
His talk about apartheid created agitation.	他的关于种族隔离的谈话激起了骚动。
His teeth are yellow from smoking too much.	他的牙齿被烟熏黄了。
His wife made some pumpkin pies for supper.	他妻子做了一些南瓜馅饼作晚餐。
His work comes up to what we expect of him.	他的工作符合了我们的期望。
How can I repair the wrong I have done her?	我怎样才能补救我对她的冤枉？
How do you usually spend your leisure time?	你通常是怎样度过你的空闲时间？
How many students are there in your school?	你们学校有多少学生？
How pleasant it is to dine on Chinese food!	吃上中餐是多么令人愉快啊！
How well done do you want your steak to be?	你会说什么语言？
I almost always play baseball after school.	我几乎总是在放学后打棒球。
I am in accordance with him in this matter.	在这件事情上我同他是一致的。
I can't get over that shirt he was wearing.	我觉得他穿的那件衬衣真可笑。
I can't tell you how to pronounce the word.	我不知道怎么告诉你这个词的发音。
I cared nothing about what they said of me.	我毫不在乎他们对我怎么说。
I chanced to be thinking of the same thing.	我碰巧想到同样的事。
I consider fruit to be the healthiest food.	我将水果视为最健康的食物。
I did the letter on my electric typewriter.	我是用电动打字机打这封信的。
I don't have time for a vacation this year.	我今年没时间去度假。
I don't know for certain when he will come.	我不知道他来这里的确切时间。
I don't know when he came back from France.	我不知道他是什么时候从法国回来的。
I don't know whether he is willing to come.	我不知道他是否愿意来。
I don't like to leave things up in the air.	我不喜欢让事情悬而未决。
I don't like to mix business with pleasure.	我不喜欢把生意和快乐混在一起。
I don't want something like this to happen.	我不想这种事发生。
I don't want to go to Tom's birthday party.	我不想去汤姆的聚会。
I feel unqualified to speak on the subject.	我自觉无资格就此问题发言.
I got sick of his smoking in the classroom.	我讨厌他在教室抽烟。
I had no choice but to stay in bed all day.	我不得不一整天都待在床上。
I have a few friends who speak French well.	我有一些法语说得好的朋友。
I have a matter of importance to deal with.	我有要事要处理。
I have a special relationship with my aunt.	我和我阿姨有种特别的情谊。
I have been reading the book all afternoon.	我整个下午都在读这本书。
I have no idea of what's going on in there.	我不清楚这里发生了什么事？
I have not heard from John for a long time.	我好久没有收到约翰的来信了。
I have to take my medicine every six hours.	我每六小时要服一次药。
I haven't been getting enough sleep lately.	我最近一直睡眠不足。
I hope to see you again sometime next year.	我希望明年某一时候再见到你。
I hung up my horse and walked into the inn.	我们把马拴在桩上，走进了客栈。
I just didn't want to go to work yesterday.	昨天我只是不想去工作。
I just want to know what actually happened.	我只想知道实际上发生了什么。
I knocked on the door, but nobody answered.	我敲门，但是没有人回应。
I loathe having to go to these conferences.	我最讨厌的是得参加这些会议.
I look forward to being alone in the house.	我盼望著能自己一人在这所房子  .
I lost a white handkerchief with blue lace.	我丢了一块带蓝色花边的白手绢。
I met with an old friend in the town today!	我今天在城里遇到了一位老朋友呢！
I need your passport and three photographs.	我需要你的护照和三张照片。
I noticed that she was wearing new glasses.	我注意到她戴着新眼镜。
I overslept because my alarm didn't go off.	因为闹铃没有响，所以我继续睡下去了。
I owe my teachers and parents a great deal.	我深深感激师长与父母.
I plied him with questions about his novel.	我就他的小说向他提问。
I recognize that what he says is the truth.	我承认他说的是事实。
I recommend that you inquire about the job.	我建议你打听一下这项工作。
I refuse to be treated like a slave by you.	我拒绝被你像奴隶一样对待。
I spent the whole day in reading the novel.	我一整天都在看这本小说。
I still don't see the point you emphasized.	我仍然弄不清楚你所强调的要点。
I supervised the workers loading the lorry.	我监督工人把货物装上卡车.
I take it for granted that he will succeed.	我认为他会成功是理所当然的。
I think that you ought to apologize to her.	我认为你应该跟她道歉。
I tried to change her mind, but I couldn't.	我试著改变她的心意，但我没有办法。
I unlocked the door and went into the room.	我打开房门，然后走进屋里。
I want everyone to help me clean the house.	我希望所有人都来帮我打扫房子。
I want to ask you some questions about Tom.	我想问你一些关于汤姆的问题。
I want to stay in a hotel near the airport.	我想住在机场附近的旅馆里。
I was astonished at the news of his escape.	听到他逃之夭夭的消息，我感到惊讶。
I was kept waiting for nearly half an hour.	我等了接近半小时。
I was sorry to hear that your cat had died.	听说你的猫死了，我觉得很难过。
I was told that Spain is a romantic nation.	有人告诉我说，西班牙是个浪漫的国家。
I went out in the rain and got wet through.	我冒雨出去，结果被淋得湿透了。
I went to the station to see my friend off.	我去车站为我朋友送行。
I will be leaving for Australia next month.	我下个月将去澳洲。
I will come provided that I am well enough.	只要我身体好一定来。
I wonder how many Canadians live in Boston.	我在想有多少加拿大人住在波士顿。
I would like to go to the concert with you.	我想和你一起去音乐会。
I'd be unhappy, but I wouldn't kill myself.	我会不高兴，但我不会自杀。
I'd like some shrimp-roe soy sauce with it.	我希望用些虾子酱蘸着吃。
I'll book you on a direct flight to London.	我将为你预订直飞伦敦的航班。
I'll deal with decimals in the next lesson.	下一堂课我要讲小数.
I'm afraid I differ with you on this point.	恐怕就这点上，我和你持不同意见。
I'm afraid I wouldn't be very good company.	我恐怕不是个很好的伙伴。
I'm afraid she won't accept my explanation.	我怕她不会接受我的解释。
I'm composing a formal reply to the letter.	我正写一封郑重其事的回信.
I'm just writing a letter to my girlfriend.	我只是在写一封信给我的女友。
I'm so tired I could sleep for a whole day.	我真是累极了，简直可以睡上一整天。
I've heard the French version of this song.	我听过这首歌的法语版。
I've never made payment in Renminbi before.	我从未用过人民币付款。
I've only recently started learning French.	我是最近才开始学法语的。
If he is innocent, then his wife is guilty.	如果他是清白的，那他妻子就有罪。
If he studied hard, he would pass the test.	如果他努力学习，他会通过考试的。
If she was displeased, she never showed it.	如果她不高兴, 她从来不表现出来。
If you don't want to go, you don't need to.	如果你不想去, 就不必去了。
In old society, the gentry lived in luxury.	在旧社会，贵族们生活奢侈。
In the storm I took shelter under the tree.	暴风雨时，我正在树下躲避。
Incidentally, John's coming home next week.	附带说一下，约翰下星期要回家。
Inclined to communicate readily; talkative.	健谈的倾向于易于沟通的；爱说话的
Inequalities in wealth cause social unrest.	贫富不均可造成社会动荡.
Instead of admit his guilt, he prevaricate.	他不但不承认，反而支吾其词。
Introduction of a venom into animal tissue.	毒液的输入毒液输入动物的细胞组织
Is the comrade we just saw as your teacher?	我们刚才看见的那位同志是你的老师吗？
Is there any command from the headquarters?	有司令部的任何命令吗？
Is/Are porridge oats on the breakfast menu?	早餐的食谱上有燕麦粥吗?
It all adds up to this-he is a selfish man.	所有这些说明一点－－他是一个自私自利的人。
It is a great folly to try to persuade him.	试图说服他未免太愚蠢了。
It is by no means easy to satisfy everyone.	要满足每一个人绝非易事。
It is more blessed to give than to receive.	赠与比接受更让人觉得幸福。
It is not easy to learn a foreign language.	学会一门外语不容易。
It left him at a complete loss (for words).	这使他完全茫然（而语塞）了.
It looks as if we were in for a cold spell.	看样子要过一段寒潮天气。
It makes no difference (to me) what you say	不管你怎麽说（对我来说）都无所谓, 反正我不去.
It takes a lot of labor to build a railway.	修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。
It takes me an hour to walk there and back.	我步行一个来回用一小时。
It took us half an hour to set up the tent.	搭帐篷花了我们半小时。
It was courageous of her to opposeher boss.	她真有胆量, 竟敢对抗上司.
It's easy to sell insurance to a pessimist.	向悲观的人推销保险很容易.
It's really different from what I expected.	这真的跟我所预期的不同。
It's very big of you to admit you're wrong.	你能承认你错了是很伟大的。
It's very hard getting a taxi in this city.	在这个城市，很难打到的。
Japan depends on imports for raw materials.	日本依赖进口原料。
Jim entered all his expenses in a notebook.	吉姆把他的一切支出都记在笔记本里。
John repaired the tape recorder by himself.	约翰靠他自己修理录音机。
Just take care of yourself and don't worry.	别着急，安心养病。
Leather can deteriorate in damp conditions.	皮革受潮可变质.
Let me give you a needle to numb the tooth.	我给你打一针使这颗牙齿麻木。
Let me help you. Your bag looks very heavy.	让我来帮你吧。你的包看起来很重。
Let's divide this money between you and me.	这钱你和我分了吧。
Let's go on to the next item on the agenda.	我们讨论议程表上的下一项吧.
Let's not enter into details at this stage.	咱们不要在现阶段著手处理具体问题。
Let's proceed with the items on the agenda.	让我们继续进行议程上的项目。
Let's try to straighten out this confusion.	咱们努力收拾这个混乱的局面吧.
Local landowners often mistreated peasants.	当地地主常常虐待农民。
Make another appointment at the front desk.	在服务台另外预约。
Many bridges were swept away by the floods.	洪水冲毁了许多桥梁.
Many children under 5 go to nursery school.	5岁以下的许多儿童都上幼儿园.
Many of the immigrants changed their names.	许多移民改了名字。
Many students like to study in the morning.	许多学生喜欢在早上学习。
Marking examination papers is a real grind.	批改试卷的确是个苦事。
Marriage is the main cause of all divorces.	结婚是所有离婚的主要原因。
Money put into the credit cards is at call.	划入信用卡的钱可以随时支取。
Most of my salary goes on/in (paying) rent.	我薪水的大部分都用来付房租了.
My brother is holding a camera in his hand.	我弟弟手里拿着一个摄像机。
My ex-husband no longer lives in this city.	我前男友不再住在这个城市了。
My expenditure is conditioned by my income.	我的支出受我的收入限制。
My expenses claim includes 15 for sundries.	我的报销申请中包括 15 英镑杂项支出.
My grandfather's photograph is on the wall.	我祖父的照片在墙上挂着。
My monthly income was just over 200 pounds.	我每月的收入是200多磅。
My older sister often drinks tea with milk.	我的姐姐经常就着牛奶喝茶。
My parents always frown on late nights out.	我父母向来不赞成深夜外出.
My passport is due to expire in two months.	我的护照再过两个月就到期了。
My sister takes piano lessons twice a week.	我妹妹每周上两次钢琴课。
My son grabbed my hand and wouldn't let go.	我儿子抓住我的手不撒开。
My uncles come to see me from time to time.	我的叔叔们（舅舅们）有时会来探望我。
News of his death was cabled to his family.	他的死讯已电告其家属。
No country can afford to neglect education.	任何国家都不容忽视教育。
No matter what you say, the answer is "no."	不管你说什么, 答案就是＂不。＂
Non-union labour was used to end the strike	雇用了没参加工会的工人以结束罢工行动.
Nothing could rekindle her extinct passion.	她激情已逝, 无从心回意转.
Oil from these fields is priced in dollars.	这些油田产的油以美元定价.
Once he had written the letter, he sent it.	信一写好，他就把它寄了。
One can not identify happiness with wealth.	幸福和财富不能混为一谈。
One can't help many, but many can help one.	一个人帮不了许多个，但许多人能帮助一个。
One of hostesses on tonight's show is Mary.	今晚的女主持之一是玛丽。
One of our spies has defected to the enemy.	我们的一名特工已叛变投敌.
One who has everything can lose everything.	拥有一切的人可能会失去一切。
One who makes or enacts laws; a legislator.	立法者制定或颁布法律的人；立法者
Only one person can do the job, namely you.	只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
Our country has a bountiful supply of food.	我们国家有充足的食物供应。
Our journey ended without (further) mishap.	我们的旅程（後来）一路平安.
Our tanks have breached the enemy defences.	我方坦克突破了敌人的防线.
Our teacher has a wonderful sense of humor.	我们的老师非常有幽默感。
Our wooden sofa seems not very comfortable.	我们的木头沙发似乎不太舒服。
Owing to the rain, the match was cancelled.	由于下雨，取消了比赛。
Pleasantly pungent or tart in taste; spicy.	辣味的，开胃的尝起来辛辣但美味的；佐料多的
Please be careful when crossing the street.	过马路时请小心。
Please put the receiver back after calling.	打完电话后，请把听筒放回原位。
Please put your litter in the bin provided.	请你把废物扔到预备好的垃圾箱里.
Please state your name, age and occupation.	请说明姓名、年龄和职业。
Plunder taken from an enemy in time of war.	劫掠物，战利品战时取自敌人的战利品
Police's vigilance was eventually rewarded.	警方时时警戒终有所获。
Politeness is the attribute of a gentleman.	温文有礼是绅士的特质。
Premier Zhou is a distinguished politician.	周总理是一位卓越的政治家。

Real life isn't as happy as people imagine.	现实生活并不象人们想象的那样美好。
Red squirrels are now very rare in Britain.	红色的松鼠在英国已十分罕见了.
Repack all the superfluous cups in the box.	把多余的杯子都重新装入箱中.

She always gets the better of our quarrels.	我们吵架时她总是占上风.
She associated happiness with having money.	她把幸福和有钱联想到一起。
She carry out all her pledge to the letter.	她不折不扣地履行了她的所有诺言。
She cleaned the dirt from her finger-nails.	她从指甲里剔掉污垢.
She enjoyed high prestige among the masses.	她在群众中享有很高威信。
She erred in failing to meet him in person.	她错在没有亲自与他见面。
She feels (she's been) rather hard done by.	她觉得（自己）有点委屈.
She had been in the same post for 20 years.	她担任同一职务已20年.
She has set up in business as a bookseller.	她已创业成为书商.
She hasn't phoned since she went to London.	自她去了伦敦后，就没再打电话了。
She hesitated to hurt the child's feelings.	她不想伤害孩子的感情。
She is conservative in the way she dresses.	她在衣著上很保守.
She kept on working although she was tired.	她虽疲劳但仍继续工作。
She learned English from a Chinese teacher.	她向一个中国教员学习英语。
She liked tennis and became a tennis coach.	她喜欢网球并成为了一个网球教练。
She looked ready to collapse at any minute.	她看样子随时都可能垮下来.
She made out the application for admission.	她提出了入学申请。
She matured her novel by constant revision.	她不断修改自己的小说以使其趋于完善。

They decorated the house regardless of cost.	他们不惜工本装修这栋房子。
They didn't even try to stop him getting it.	他们甚至没有试图去阻止他得到它。
They discussed the weather and other topics.	他们讨论了气候和其他的话题。
They don't usually imprison first offenders.	他们通常不监禁初次犯罪的人。

They fell into the conversation immediately.	他们很快就聊起来了。
They forced me to do things against my will.	他们强迫我做违背我心意的事。

They live in perfect accord with each other.	他们生活在一起十分融洽.

I think it's better for us to adopt his plan.	我认为采用他的计划对我们比较好。

He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.	他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去.
He is a man of subtle and refined sensibility.	他是个感情细腻的男子。
He is accused because offending electoral law.	他因被指控触犯选举法而遭逮捕。
He is exempt from punishment about this thing.	关于此事对他已免于处分。
He is not as intelligent as his older brother.	他不像他的兄长那样聪明。
He is the manager of the marketing department.	他是营销部的负责人。
He laughed to cover (ie hide) his nervousness.	他哈哈大笑以遮掩紧张的心情.
He lifted the mat and slid the key under (it).	他掀起垫子把钥匙悄悄放在下面.
He likes to set himself up as an intellectual.	他喜欢自命为知识分子.
He looked around to confirm that he was alone.	他四处张望，要确定周围没人。
He looks old, but he is still in his twenties.	他看上去老，但他还不到30岁。
He lost one of the pieces of his model engine.	他的火车头模型缺了一个零件.
He made many ludicrous mistakes in his speech.	他的演讲中有许多可笑的错误。
He mentioned in passing that he had a new car.	他顺便提到他有一辆新汽车。
He opened the door and motioned me to come in.	他打开了门，招手让我进去。
He picked up a mirror and examined his tongue.	他拿了面镜子细看自己的舌头。
He played the personage of Hamlet in the play.	他在这个剧中扮演哈姆雷特。
He possesses a lot of immovable real property.	他拥有许多不动产。
He really loves beer and gets drunk every day.	他喜欢喝爱啤酒，而且每天都喝醉。
He regrets not having worked harder at school.	他后悔在校时没用功读书。
He renounced his religion and became a Muslim.	他宣布脱离他原来的宗教而成为了一名穆斯林教徒。
He resolved that nothing should hold him back.	他下决心不让任何事情阻挡他。
He richly deserved the punishment he received.	他受到的处罚是罪有应得。
He rocked back and forth in his rocking chair.	他坐在摇椅里前后摇晃着。
He said he would come, and sure enough he did.	他说他会来的，果然来了。
He saved his strength for the end of the race.	他留着劲在比赛结束时用。
He shook his head, for he thought differently.	他摇摇头，因为他的想法与此不同。
He stared at the words in complete puzzlement.	他注视著那些语句, 茫然不解.
He stole into the cinema without being caught.	他偷偷溜进了电影院而没有被人逮着。
He struck off the rotten branches with an axe.	他用斧头砍掉了朽烂的树枝.
He taught us that Columbus discovered America.	他教导我们说, 哥伦布发现了美洲。
He thinks it's a shame to beg others for alms.	他认为向他人乞求救济是耻辱。
He took an immediate aversion to his new boss.	他对新老板一见就反感.
He transplanted the seedlings into peaty soil.	他把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里。
He turned a deaf ear to all requests for help.	他不理会一切求援的呼吁。
He walked in front of me like a proud peacock.	他像一只骄傲的孔雀一样在我前面趾高气扬地走着。
He was excused from attendance at the lecture.	他获准可以不去听讲。
He was forced by the circumstances to do this.	他做此事是为环境所迫。
He was invited to be the chairman of the club.	他受邀做俱乐部的主席。
He was kind enough to take me to the hospital.	他好心地把我送到医院。
He was only eight when he ascended the throne.	他登上王位时才八岁。
He was sitting with his head buried in a book.	他坐着埋头看书。

He will come to see you on the third of April.	他将于四月三日来看你。
He's always out of sorts early in the morning.	他大清早总是不痛快.

Tom isn't the only one here who's a good singer.	汤姆不是这里唯一的好歌手。
Tom learned how to do that from his grandfather.	汤姆从他祖父那里学会了怎么做。
Tom said he wasn't ready, but Mary said she was.	汤姆说他没准备好，但玛丽说她准备好了。
Tom seems to be a fairly successful businessman.	汤姆看来是个很成功的商人。
Tom suggested that I change the lock on my door.	汤姆建议我换我的门锁。
Translate the following sentences into Japanese.	将下列句子翻译成日文。
Two months have passed since he left for France.	自从他离开去法国，已经有两个月了。
We admired the splendor of the mountain scenery.	我们赞赏着壮丽的山景。
We all like the tranquility of the country life.	我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。
We anticipate that demand is likely to increase.	我们预料需求可能增加.
We are grateful to you for your bounteous gifts.	对您给予的丰厚礼物，我们不胜感激。
We begin to plumb the mysteries of the universe.	我们开始探索宇宙的奥秘。
We bought some ornaments for the Christmas tree.	我们买了一些装饰品来点缀圣诞树。
We can use solar energy to do many things today.	如今，我们可以利用太阳能做很多事情。
We decided to delay our wedding until next year.	我们决定把婚礼推迟到明年。
We did not start until the sun rose in the east.	直到太阳从东方升起，我们才出发。
We have done all we could to catch up with them.	我们已经尽了一切可能来赶上他们。
We have less infantry and armour than the enemy.	我们的步兵和装甲兵均比敌军的少.
We have no other choice than to agree with them.	我们除了同意他们之外，没有别的选择。
We have to draw off because of losses of forces.	伤亡太大, 我们不得不撤退。
We managed to lose our pursuers in the darkness.	我们趁黑摆脱了追踪的人.
We need a mechanical digger to level the ground.	我们需要一台挖掘机来平整土地。
We should use anthracite to avoid air pollution.	我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染。
We used to go to the movies on Saturday evening.	我们曾经总在星期六傍晚去看电影。
We want to be on the first bus tomorrow morning.	我们想乘明天早上第一班公交车。
We will deal with events in historical sequence.	我们将按照历史上的先后顺序研究这些事件。
We'll do all we can to catch up the world level.	我们会尽力来达到世界水平。
We're so busy we have to farm out a lot of work.	我们太忙, 许多工作得招人承包.
We've booked a conjuror for our Christmas party.	我们为圣诞节的聚会预约了一位魔术师.
We've booked you in at the Plaza for two nights.	我们为你在普拉扎旅馆预订了两夜的房间.
What I need now is the security of a happy home.	我现在需要的是一个幸福家庭所给予的安全感。
What can we do to prevent the disease spreading?	我们能做什么来防止这种疾病蔓延呢？
When I left the hospital I was completely cured.	出院时，我已经完全痊愈了。
When he retired, his son took over the business.	他退休的时候，他儿子接手了他的生意。
Where do you suppose you'll spend your vacation?	你认为你会到哪儿度假？
Whether you will go (or not), please call me up.	不论你去不去，请打电话给我。
While you are reading to me, I can do my sewing.	你读给我听的时候，我就可以做缝纫了。
Who will take care of the dog while we are away?	当我们离开的时候，谁来照顾狗？
Women and children were butchered by the rebels.	妇女和儿童遭到叛乱者的屠杀.
Wring the water out of your wet bathing costume.	把你的游泳衣里的水拧出去.
You can give up all/any thought of marrying Tom.	你一定要断了嫁给汤姆的念头.
You can plug into the national computer network.	你可以接通全国计算机网络。
You don't have to tell Tom if you don't want to.	如果你不想，那你便没有这个必要去告诉汤姆。
You have a choice of black tea, coffee, or milk.	你可以选择红茶，咖啡或牛奶。
You must acquaint yourself with your new duties.	你必须熟悉自己的新职务。
You must watch your step so as not to fall down.	你必须留心脚下才不会跌下去。
You nearly poked me in the eye with your pencil.	你的铅笔差点戳到我的眼睛了。
You should have introduced yourself to the girl.	你应该向那个女孩自我介绍的。
You used to be able to see the church from here.	你以前可以从这里看到教堂。
You will soon get accustomed to your new school.	你很快就会适应你的新学校。
You'll find little system in his method of work.	他的工作方法无甚条理.
You're no use in the choir you cant sing a note!	你对合唱团毫无益处--你简直唱不成调!
You're not old enough to get a driver's license.	你还没到可以拿驾驶执照的年龄。
Young ladies used to have lessons in deportment.	少女以前要上仪态课。
Your carrier for this flight is British Airways.	你的这一班机是英国航空公司的飞机.
Your company has been a great consolation to me.	能和你在一起对我是件极为安慰的事。

He equals me in strength but not in intelligence.	他在气力方面和我相等, 但在智力方面却不如我。

He failed the exam, but he doesn't care too much.	他考试失败了，但他不太在意。
He gave her a suggestive glance, and she blushed.	他用挑逗的目光看了她一眼，羞得她满脸通红。
He hacked (away) at the branch until it fell off.	他朝著树枝（不停地）砍, 直到砍下为止.

He is young and good-looking, and also very rich.	他又年轻又漂亮, 而且还很富有.
He just grabbed the bag from my hand and ran off.	他抢走我手中的提包就跑了.

He stopped sweeping and rested against the broom.	他停止扫地，倚着扫帚休息。
He taught that the earth revolves around the sun.	他指出地球是围绕太阳转的.
He thinks it's a sin to covet other's properties.	他认为贪图他人的财物是有罪的。
He took the ninth position in his class of forty.	他在40 个人的班级里排第九名。

He was too poor to buy an astronomical telescope.	他太穷了，买不起天文望远镜。
He would often come to see us when I was a child.	当我还是个孩子时，他经常来看望我们。
He's always missing when there's work to be done.	一到干活儿的时候, 他就不见了.

Her careful make-up hid the signs of age beneath.	她的精心化妆掩饰了脂粉下面岁月刻下的痕迹。

Her dress was a full three inches above the knee.	她的连衣裙下摆离膝盖整整三英寸.
Her prayer answered and her son came home safely.	她的祈祷应验了，儿子平安地回到了家。
Her prose is far too mannered and self-conscious.	她的散文过於矫揉造作.

High prices for farm products encouraged farming.	农产品价格的提高有助于农业。
His hometown is an insignificant city on the map.	他的家乡只是地图上一个不起眼的小城。

How could you do such a thing? Have you no shame?	你怎麽竟然做出这种事? 你难道不知羞耻吗?
How distant those times seemed now, he reflected.	他在想那些日子现在已显得多麽遥远.

Human life and turnip remain cheap and plentiful.	人命与萝卜依然是多而且便宜。
Hunger and disease had weakened his constitution.	他饥饿与疾病交加，体质已削弱。
I admit this may not be the best way of doing it.	我承认这可能不是最好的方法。
I always make a point of giving a hand to others.	我始终认为帮助别人是重要的。
I always run over my lines before going on stage.	我登台演出前总要温习一下台词.

I appreciate that you may have prior commitments.	我体谅你可能事先已另有承诺.

I gave Mary a apple to change my favorite banana.	我送给玛丽一个苹果换我最喜欢吃的香蕉。

I have been resident in this hotel for two weeks.	我已经在这家旅馆里住了两个星期了。
I have nothing to say in relation to that matter.	关于那件事, 我没什么好说的。
I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?	我要写一封信。你有纸吗？
I hope to retire from work when I'm 60 years old.	我希望在六十岁时退休。
I hope you were never put out by my long silence.	我希望你不曾因为我好久不给你写信而感到担心。
I like watching the performance of that magician.	我喜欢看那个魔术师的表演。

I have nothing to say with regard to that problem.	对于这个问题我无可奉告。

I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.	我有两条狗。一条是白色的，另一条是黑色的。
I hope he'll be able to come! I'd like to see him.	我希望他能来！我想见他。
I know her face but I can't call her name to mind.	我认得她，但想不起她的名字了。

Her husband's death knocked Mrs.Jones off her feet.	琼斯夫人丈夫的死讯把她吓蒙了。

Her parents can't help worrying about her injuries.	她的父母不能不担心她的伤势。

Her theory was quoted without (an) acknowledgement.	她的理论被人引用而未向她致谢.

His feet were a little deformed, and he stepped up.	他的脚稍有先天畸形，走起路来一瘸一拐。
His general state of health is fairly satisfactory.	他总的健康状况相当令人满意。
His intervention brought their quarrel to a climax.	他一干预使他们的口角达到最激烈程度.
His moving speech was enough to carry the audience.	他讲话感人足以赢得听众同情.

I couldn't prevent Tom from eating all the cookies.	我阻止不了汤姆把饼干全吃了。
I discovered that speaking English was pretty easy.	我发觉说英语很简单。
I don't even want to think about what could happen.	我甚至不想去想会发生什么。

He lives in a warren of narrow twisting old streets.	他住在街道弯弯曲曲的狭窄拥塞的老街区。
He made the attic in the small house a reading room.	他把小屋的阁楼当作阅读室。
He must have said so without giving it much thought.	他一定没有多考虑就说了。
He never goes out but he drops in at that bookstore.	他每次外出都会顺道去那家书店待一会儿。
He peddled small household articles around the town.	他在城里挨家挨户兜售日用百货.
He pinched and scraped for many years to save money.	为了存钱他省吃俭用了许多年。
He prides himself on remaining calm in an emergency.	他在紧急关头十分镇静为此感到骄傲。
He recited as much of the poem as he could remember.	他把诗中记得住的都背诵出来了。
He regarded his marriage merely as a means to an end	他仅把结婚当作达到目的的手段, 他只是想要妻子的财产.
He said he hadn't got time or made some such excuse.	他说他没有时间, 或是诸如此类的藉口.
He skulked around outside until the police had gone.	他窥探著四周，直至见到警察走开。
He smeared some balm on his hand to soothe the pain.	他在手上涂了些药膏来止痛。
He stood shivering on the brink, waiting to dive in.	他站在边上等待跳水时浑身发抖.
He studied none the less hard because he had failed.	即使他失败了，却仍然用功念书。
He that lies down with dogs must rise up with fleas.	[谚]与狗同眠的人必然惹一身跳蚤；同坏人为伍必然吃亏。
He turned up his coat collar against the chill wind.	他竖起大衣领抵御寒风.
He was a boring nuisance! I'm glad to be rid of him.	他这人真讨厌! 我很庆幸能摆脱他的纠缠.
He was buried by an avalanche and had to be dug out.	他遇雪崩被埋住了，得把他挖出来。
He was hit by a falling tree and killed on the spot.	他被倒下来的树击中，当场死亡。
He was named director of the plant after liberation.	解放后，他被任命为这个厂的厂长。
He was taxed with neglecting the safety regulations.	他由于忽视安全操作规程而受到责备。
He was very lonely at first when he moved to London.	他当初刚到伦敦时很孤单.
He's so suspicious he would distrust his own mother.	他这人疑心太重, 连自己的母亲也不相信.
Her carriage was the most beautiful one in the yard.	她的马车是院子里最漂亮的。
Her daughter's bonny eyes are parts of her heredity.	她女儿的漂亮眼睛是来自她的部分遗传特征。
Her hair has been badly cut and the ends are uneven.	她的头发剪得很糟，发梢高低不齐。
Her handling of the crisis fills me with admiration.	她对这一危机的处理使我赞叹不已.
Her shabby appearance drew sniggers from the guests.	她样子寒酸, 客人不禁暗自发笑.
Her whole life has been given to the study of dance.	她一生献身于研究舞蹈。
Here's a five-pound note -- you can keep the change.	这是五镑的钞票--零钱不用找了.
Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.	嗨，我可能没钱，但我一直有我的骄傲。
His brazen act of defiance almost cost him his life.	他怀疑的无耻行为差点要了他的命。
His cowardice in face of the enemy was contemptible.	他在敌人面前胆小如鼠，真是可鄙。
His deafness shuts him off from the lives of others.	他耳聋阻碍了他与别人的交往.
His fame rests more on his plays than on his novels.	他出名是靠他的戏剧, 并不是靠小说.
His heart melted when he saw the little girl crying.	看到这个小女孩哭起来，他的心软了。
His improved performance does credit to his trainer.	他的表演有进步，这应该归功於他的教练。
His observations are sharp, but he doesn't say much.	他的观察是敏锐的，但他没有说太多。
His pessimism has the effect of depressing everyone.	他的悲观情绪感染得大家情绪低落.

I doubt that Tom knew that Mary was already married.	我怀疑汤姆知道玛丽已婚。
I guess it must require some skills to fly a glider.	我想驾驶滑翔机一定需要些技术。
I have a dog and a cat, but they fight all the time.	我养了一只猫和一只狗，但它们老是打架。
I have learned a lot from the chastening experience.	我从这个可以引以为戒的经历中学到了很多。
I have no other wish except to pass the examination.	我除了要通过考试之外，没有别的心愿。
I have to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.	我每天至少要把厨房地板擦洗一次。
I left a message so as to be sure of contacting her.	我留下了张条子以便与她取得联系。

He made oblique references to her lack of experience.	他拐弯抹角地说她缺乏经验。
He made some very disputable claims about his record.	他声称创造了新纪录, 那可大有争议.
He mustered all his courage to take part in the game.	他鼓起全部的勇气参加比赛。
He never goes on a vacation but he takes his pet dog.	他每次度假都会带他的狗去。
He obtained the dissolution of his marriage with her.	他解除了和她的婚姻。
He often talks about his girlfriend in terms of love.	他经常用充满爱意的语言谈论他的女朋友。
He pondered for some minutes before giving an answer.	他思考了几分钟才作答复。
He put his hand over her mouth to stop her screaming.	他伸手捂住她的嘴, 不让她叫喊.
He requested that the Premier grant him an interview.	他要求总理（同意）接见（他－次）。
He resigned his commission to take up a civilian job.	他辞去军职而从事平民工作.
He spares no expense in building a villa for himself.	他不惜工本为自己造了一幢别墅。
He swished off the tops of the nettles with his cane.	他用藤杖抽断了荨麻的顶部.
He switched on the light and plumped up the cushions.	他打开了灯，拍松了靠垫。
He was admitted to the hospital suffering from burns.	他由于烧伤，被送入医院治疗。
He was bashed up in the playground by some older boys	有几个年龄较大的男孩子在操场上对他动武.
He was hard put (to it) to explain her disappearance.	他难以说明她为什麽不见了.
He was shaking with fright as if he had seen a ghost.	他吓得直哆嗦，就好像看见了鬼一样。
He went to pieces when they told him the tragic news.	人们告诉他那悲惨的消息後，他已六神无主了。
He's always lending her money; he's too soft-hearted.	他老是把钱借给她，心肠也太软了。
He's not very reliable, but I like him just the same.	他是不太可靠, 但我仍很喜欢他.
Her explanations were met with blank incomprehension.	大家对她的解释茫然不解.
Her father will never approve of her marriage to you.	她父亲永不会同意她和你结婚。
Her scientific bias showed itself in early childhood.	她在科学方面的倾向性在孩童时代就已显现出来。
His ability carried him to the top of his profession.	他有才干能在本行业中首屈一指。
His disappearance is being looked into by the police.	他失踪一事警方正在调查.
His partial attitude called forth a lot of criticism.	他的偏袒态度招致了不少批评。
His public speaking manner is still not very assured.	他演讲的神态还显出有点缺乏自信.
His smile deepened, but he made no attempt to answer.	他的微笑加深了，但他没有打算要回答。
His wild behavior was a great distress to his mother.	他的放荡的行为使他的母亲极为苦恼。
How much of what I've written here do you understand?	你了解多少我写在这里的东西?
How warm is it today? It's in the (high/low) fifties.	今天气温有多少度? 五十几度（不到六十度[五十度出头]）.
I am not at all satisfied with the present situation.	我对现状根本不满意。
I am not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.	我不太确定我们是否能够满足你的要求。
I am placing you under arrest for attempted burglary.	我按企图盗窃罪逮捕你.
I came across an old friend in changed circumstances.	我遇到了一位境遇变化了的老友。
I can't bear the stresses and strains of modern life.	我不能忍受现代生活的压力和紧张。
I don't understand why pepperoni pizza is so popular.	我不懂为何义式辣肠披萨如此受欢迎。
I doubt whether they really have sufficient manpower.	我怀疑他们是否真有足够的人力。
I got holiday jobs in guesthouses, waiting on tables.	我假期在宾馆里干活儿，当服务员。
I got the job on the strength of your recommendation.	承蒙足下推荐, 我已获得这份工作.
I had to feel about in the dark for the light switch.	我得在黑暗中摸索著找电灯开关.
I hear you passed the entrance exam. Congratulations!	我听说你通过了入学考试。恭喜你了！
I kept in touch with my classmates during my journey.	我在旅行期间舆同学们保持联系。
I must ask you to accompany me to the police station.	我得要求你陪我去一趟警察分局.
I must think over the matter before giving my answer.	我在回答之前必须考虑周全。
I often reflect on the beauty and complexity of life.	我们经常思考人生的美丽与复杂。
I picked up the knife and threw it out of the window.	我拿起了那把刀，把它扔到了窗外。
I received no less than ten thousand yen for my work.	我的工资多达一万元。
I threw a life buoy to him when I saw his struggling.	看到他在挣扎，我给他扔了一个救生圈过去。
I tried to collect my thoughts but I was too excited.	我试图使思想集中起来，但是我太激动了。
I was the second to last person to hear the bad news.	我是倒数第二个得知这个坏消息的。
I wish he would desist from entertaining his friends.	我希望他别再招待他的朋友了。
I worked in a post office during the summer vacation.	暑假期间，我在邮局工作。
I would not change places with him for all the world.	无论如何我也不同他调换地方。
I'd like to try this on. Where are the fitting rooms?	我想试试这件。请问哪里是试衣间？
I'm going to sleep, tip me the wink when tea's ready.	我去睡觉，茶沏好后告诉我一声。
I'm so busy that I have to discontinue weekly visits.	我很忙，所以不得不中断每周的访问。
I'm still only a learner, so don't expect perfection!	我还在学习, 别指望我十全十美!
I'm suffocating in here; can't we open a few windows?	我觉得这儿很憋气, 咱们开几扇窗户好吗?
I've warned you over and over (again) not to do that.	我已多次告诫过你不要做那件事.
If the tree fall that way, it will destroy the house.	这棵树向那边倒下就会把那所房子压坏。
If the weather doesn't clear, we won't go for a walk.	如果天不晴，我们就不去散步。
If we mark him up a tiny bit, he'll just get through.	我们只要给他稍加点分, 他就能勉强及格.
If you haven't a compass, use the stars to guide you.	倘若没有指南针, 可利用星辰引路.
If you keep shilly-shallying like this we'll be late.	要是你老这样举棋不定, 我们就来不及了.
If you need my advice, I'd be glad to give it to you.	如果你需要我的建议，我很愿意告诉你。
If you use mirrors you can see the back of your head.	使用两个镜子能看见自己的头的後部.
In a crisis, you must get in touch with your teacher.	在危险的时候你必须跟你的老师联系。
In our family both my husband and I are wage earners.	在我们家里，丈夫和我都挣工资。
In the face of enough witness, the criminal caved in.	在足够的证据面前，这个罪犯屈服了。
In this country New Year's Day is a national holiday.	在这个国家里，元旦是全国性的假日。
Inevitably, a quarrel followed between the two sides.	双方随後不可避免地争吵起来。
Instalments are payable on the last day of the month.	分期付的款可於每月最後一日交付.
Is there more democracy in Australia than in Britain?	澳大利亚比英国更民主吗?
It doesn't matter if you don't win just do your best.	赢不了也不要紧－－只要你尽力而为。
It is absurd not to wear a coat in such cold weather.	这么冷的天不穿一件外套真荒唐。
It is better to sleep naturally than taking medicine.	最好是不服用药物自然入睡。
It is impossible to stay awake when they show slides.	当他们在放映幻灯片时，要我保持清醒是不可能的。
It is more convenient to transport the goods in bulk.	散装运送货物更方便。
It is necessary to get rid of bureaucratic practices.	必须清除官僚习气。
It is not always economic for buses to run on Sunday.	公共汽车星期日行驶不一定准能赚钱。
It is not easy to keep in mind what you have told me.	记住你告诉我的话并不容易。
It is often used as folk medicine to cure snake bite.	它常被用作治疗蛇咬伤的民间药物。
It is said that his father died in a foreign country.	据说他爸爸在外国去世了。
It is young people who favor holding beauty pageants.	赞成举办选美的是年轻人。
It makes no difference to me whether he comes or not.	他来不来对我来说没区别。
It take the negotiator ten hours to nail down a deal.	参加协商的人花了十个小时才敲定一桩生意。
It was difficult for us to decide which road to take.	对我们来说，很难决定走哪一条路。
It was so still that you would have heard a pin drop.	安静到连针掉在地上的声音你都会听得到。
It's absolutely impossible for me to go on like this.	让我像这样继续下去是绝对不可能的。
It's not his work that bothers me; it's his attitude.	困扰我的不是他的工作，而是他的态度。
It's the appropriate time for showing you our thanks.	现在向您表达我们对您的感激最为恰当。
Just for an instant I thought he was going to refuse.	我脑中有一闪念, 以为他要拒绝了.
Keep back! The building could collapse at any moment.	别靠近! 那建筑物随时可能倒塌.
Keep to the track the moor is very boggy around here.	不要偏离车道--这一带沼泽地多.

Liver-pool and England are neck and neck in strength.	利物浦足球队和英格兰足球队实力相当。
Look at from that point of view, the job become easy.	从那个观点看，这工作就容易了。
Lorries may only park here when loading or unloading.	卡车非装卸货物时不得在此停车。
Mankind learns its first language in early childhood.	人类是在幼年开始学习第一种语言的。
Many farmers are leaving the land to work in industry	很多农民离开农村转事工业劳动.
Many women throw all of their energies into a career.	许多妇女把她们的全部精力投入到职业中。
Mary is always saying that Tom isn't romantic enough.	玛丽总是说汤姆不够浪漫。
Mary is not poor. On the contrary, she is quite rich.	玛丽不穷，相反，她相当富裕。
May I sit down a minute? I've just had some bad news.	让我坐下歇一会儿，我刚得到一些坏消息。
Millions of fans follow the TV soap operas devotedly.	千百万观众非常著迷地收看这部电视连续剧.

Mt. Jade is higher than any other mountain in Taiwan.	玉山要比台湾的任何山都高。
My father has been in good shape since his operation.	自从手术后，我父亲一直处于良好的状态。
My father insisted that I should go to see the place.	我爸爸坚持要我去那地方看看。
My father works hard in order that he may support us.	我父亲辛苦地工作为了养家。
My new secretary is very good; quite a find, in fact.	我的新秘书很好，确实是难得的人才。
My son began to study multiplication when he was six.	我儿子六岁的时候开始学习乘法。
My uncle gave me some money to start me out in trade.	我叔叔给了我一些钱让我开始经商。
New laws to deal with this abuse are in the pipeline.	正在制定处理这种弊端的新法令。
Nijinsky was unsparing in his demands for perfection.	尼任斯基对演技精益求精一丝不苟.
No matter how hard the training was, she never cried.	不管训练多么艰苦，她都没有哭过。
Nowadays people travel in cars rather than carriages.	现今人们旅行都坐汽车，而不使用马车。
On the maternal side his inheritance was a happy one.	他从母方接受的遗传是良好的。
One day I lost myself on the way to my uncle's house.	有一天我在去我叔叔家的路上迷失了方向。
Our director passed away at eight o'clock last night.	我们董事长于昨晚八时去世。
Our field of vision is limited by that tall building.	我们的视野受到了那座高层建筑物的限制。
Our gas bill for the last quarter was unusually high.	我们上季度的煤气费异常高.
Our scientists are leading the way in space research.	我们的科学家在宇宙探索中处於领先地位。
Our two nations are knit together by common concerns.	我们两国被共同关切的问题连结在一起。
Our visit was ill-timed my mother had guests already.	我们探望母亲很不是时候--她家里已经来了客人.
Paying for that new carpet has eaten into my savings.	付新地毯的款用去了我的一部分储蓄。
People hang national flags out on important holidays.	在重要的节日, 人们把国旗悬挂在门外。
Pigs share certain characteristics with human beings.	猪与人类的一些特性相同。
Please cut out my overcoat according to this pattern.	我这件大衣请你照这个式样裁剪。
Please keep the cards in sequence; don't mix them up.	请把这些卡片按次序放好，别把它们搅乱了。
Punishment seemed to make no impression on the child.	惩罚对这孩子似乎没什么效果。
Rescue workers rushed to the site of the plane crash.	抢救人员冲向飞机坠毁的现场。

She broke off a piece of chocolate and gave it to me.	她掰下一块巧克力给我.

She didn'tfind the lack of a car any great privation.	她觉得没有汽车并非重大缺憾.
She encourages her to express her innermost feelings.	她鼓励她表达个人深处的感情。
She felt warm only when she sat before the fireplace.	她只有坐在壁炉前才感觉到暖和。

She kept cutting in on/cutting into our conversation.	我们谈话时她老是插嘴.
She managed to wangle an invitation to the reception.	她设法弄到了招待会的请帖.
She ran very fast to catch up with the other members.	她跑得很快是为了赶上其他成员。
She showed me her gratitude by inviting me to dinner.	她邀请我吃饭以表示她的感激。
She speaks English better than any of her classmates.	她的英语说得比班上任何人都好。
She underwent a thorough examination at the hospital.	她在医院里接受了全面检查。
She was a tall, thin girl with long, soft brown hair.	她是个又高又瘦, 留著一头又长又软的褐色头发的女孩。
She was amazed/It amazed her that he was still alive.	他居然还活著使她感到惊异.
She was fined for driving above the regulation speed.	她因超速开车而被罚款。
She wasn't any (the) less happy for being on her own.	她并不因独自一人而稍有不悦.
She wears a ring set with emeralds on her right hand.	她的右手上戴着一枚镶有绿宝石的戒指。
She will return home next Sunday, that is, the tenth.	她下周日回家，也就是10号。

He stayed one night in a motel and went on travelling.	他在一家汽车旅馆呆了一晚上，就又接着旅行了。
He stopped for applause three times during his speech.	他在讲话过程中曾停下三次等待掌声落下.
He took care of the business after his father's death.	在他父亲死后，他接管了公司。
He tried in vain to catch the butterfly on the flower.	他白费力气想抓住停在花上的蝴蝶。
He tried to hoick the meat out of the tin with a fork.	他试著用叉子把罐头里的肉使劲叉出来。
He was so impatient that I could hardly hold him back.	他是那样急躁，我简直拉他不住。
He was so sleepy that he fell asleep during the class.	他很困倦，上课时候都睡着了。
He was too absorbed in the newspaper to hear the bell.	他专心读报, 连门铃也没听见。
He wrote a book descriptive of the frontier provinces.	他写了一本描写边疆各省的专著。
He's the sort of man whom setbacks weigh very heavily.	他是那种碰到挫折就万分苦恼的人。
Hello, I'd like to order a large cheese pizza, please.	喂，我要订一个（份）大的乳酪比萨。
Her attempt to break the world record nearly came off.	她想要打破世界纪录，已接近成功。
Her bright red had set her apart from the other girls.	她的鲜红的帽子使她在姑娘们中间显得特别出众。
Her natural resilience helped her overcome the crisis.	她生性乐观有助於她渡过难关。
His eyes nearly jumped from their sockets in surprise.	他惊讶得眼珠子差一点跳出来。
His heart stopped beating and he died soon afterwards.	他心脏停止了跳动, 随即死亡.
His life is slowly draining away after a long illness.	久病後他的生命力逐渐在枯竭。
His scars bore witness to the torture he had suffered.	他身上的一处处伤痕证明他曾受到严刑拷打。
How can this fall from the third floor without injury?	从三楼掉下而没有受伤，这怎么可能呢？
Hurried disposal unadvisable market recovery envisage.	市价已见回升，仓促处理掉，不足为取。
I am convinced that things will change for the better.	我深信事情会往更好的方向转变。
I am curious to see the house where the king was born.	我极想看看那国王诞生的房子。
I am out of spirits and don't want to speak to anyone.	我心情愁闷, 不想和任何人讲话。
I can recall stories that my mother told me years ago.	我母亲好些年前讲的故事我都回想得起来。
I can't afford the upkeep of a large house and garden.	我负担不起带花园的大房子的维护费.
I didn't know who was going to meet me at the airport.	我不知道谁会在机场见我。
I dissuade him from rush in to submit his resignation.	我劝他不要急急忙忙递交辞职书。
I got an electric shock from that faulty light switch.	那个有毛病的电灯开关把我电了一下.
I got many letters of consolation when my mother died.	母亲死后，我收到许多安慰信。
I got my hearing aid on the National Health (Service).	我的助听器是国民保健署资助的.
I had to explain the reasons to satisfy his curiosity.	我只好解释原因来满足他的好奇心。
I hope his dream of becoming a pianist will come true.	我希望他成为钢琴家的梦想可以成真。
I know London as the place where I spent my childhood.	我熟悉伦敦，那是我度过童年的地方。
I must read up on Arab customs before I go to Bahrain.	在去巴林之前我必须先弄懂、熟记阿拉伯人的习惯和规矩。
I often quote myself; it add spice to my conversation.	我常引用自己说过的话，那会使我的谈话增添情趣。
I prefer to see animals living in their natural state.	我宁愿看处于野生状态的动物。
I registered the letter because it contain some money.	我把那封信挂号寄出了，因为里面有钱。
I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.	我认为秋天是一年中最美的季节。
I warned them that there might be snakes in the woods.	我提醒他们树林里可能有蛇。
I was caught in a shower and got drenched to the skin.	我遇上了阵雨被淋得全身湿透。
I was in such a hurry that I put my clothes on anyhow.	我很匆忙, 所以随便地把衣服穿上了。
I was just thinking (to myself) what a long way it is.	我刚才还在琢磨著这条路多长啊.
I was searched by the customs officers at the airport.	我在机场被海关人员搜查。
I will follow him to the uttermost parts of the earth.	即便是天涯海角我也要跟随他。
I wish someone would help me with English composition.	我希望有人能教我英语作文。
I won't stand for his unreasonable demands any longer.	我再也不会容忍他的无理要求了。
I would be the last to attempt to answer the question.	我是最不可能去尝试回答这个问题。
I wouldn't be too surprised if this song became a hit.	如果这歌成名，我不会太惊讶。
I'd love a holiday if our money will stretch that far.	我们的钱省著花要是能富余出来，我倒是很想去度假。
I'm getting married again, but keep it dark, will you?	我要再婚了，可要保密呀，行吗？
I'm glad I don't have to go out on such a dirty night.	我庆幸自己不必在天气这样恶劣的夜晚外出.
I'm going off to Vancouver next week to see my sister.	下周我去温哥华看我妹妹。
I'm going to run a couple of errands. Wanna tag along?	我要去购物。你要跟着来吗？
I'm just going to check in these books at the library.	我要去图书馆还这些书。
I'm not sure that his business is strictly legitimate.	我说不好他的生意是否全部合法。
I'm sorry, caller, their telephone seems to be broken.	对不起，对方的电话好象坏了。
I'm sure you'll love what we have on the menu tonight.	我肯定你会喜欢我们今晚的菜肴。
I've made a few minor adjustments to the seating plan.	我对座次表作了小小的调整。
If I lost my key, I wouldn't be able to lock the door.	如果我弄丢了我的钥匙，我就无法锁门了。
If I walk in with muddy boots, Dad always scolds (me).	我的靴子上要是有泥, 一进屋爸爸就骂（我）.
If I were invisible, I wouldn't have to wear anything.	若我是隐形的，就不用穿衣服了。
If I were to tell you all I know, you would be amazed.	要是我告诉你我所知的一切，你会被惊呆的。
If ever she gives a party she likes to do it in style.	她每举办舞会，总喜欢搞得很排场。
If the industry doesn't modernize it will not survive.	该制造业若不现代化就不能继续存在.
If there had been no book, we will have been ignorant.	要是过去没有书，我们就会愚昧无知。
If this news ever reaches her ears, she'll be furious.	这个消息万一传到她的耳朵里，她一定得大发雷霆。
If you are late again the boss will give you the sack.	如果你再迟到，老板就会把你解雇。
If you don't pull your socks up, you'll fail the exam.	如果你不加紧努力，你考试会不及格的。
If you persevere with work, you'll succeed in the end.	你如果把工作坚持下去，最终会取得成功的。
In a fit of remorse she burnt all her lover's letters.	她在一阵悔恨之中把情人的信都烧了.
In a little while she delivered the baby with forceps.	一会儿她就用钳子把孩子接下来了。
In no respect can he be looked upon as a good husband.	无论在哪一方面他都不能被看作是个好丈夫。
In our garden we have egg-plants, cucumber and potato.	在我们的菜园里，我们种了茄子，黄瓜和土豆。
In writing, the title `Doctor' is abbreviated to `Dr'.	在书写时, Doctor头衔的缩写是Dr.
Is that a fair inference (to draw) from his statement?	从他的说法中得出这种结论恰当吗?
Is the human race threatened with complete extinction?	人类是否会受到完全灭绝的威胁呢？
Is there anything you want to add to what I just said?	我刚才说的内容，你想补充么？
It has a hospital served by42 trained medical workers.	它有一座医院，有42名经过训练的医务人员。
It is (a) sacrilege to steal a crucifix from an altar.	从圣坛窃取耶稣受难像是亵渎神灵的行为.
It is close to eleven. It's about time we went to bed.	快11点了。我们该上床睡觉了。
It is wrong for a man to conceal things from his wife.	一个男人对妻子隐瞒事情是不对的。
It isn't a rare bird, just a common or garden sparrow.	那不是稀有的鸟, 只不过是普通的麻雀.
It stands to reason that nobody will work without pay.	做工作不能白做，这是明摆著的事。
It took more or less a whole day to paint the ceiling.	粉刷天花板用了将近一整天的时间。
It was blowing gales of hurricane this time yesterday.	昨天的这个时候正刮着狂风。
It was generous of her to contribute such a large sum.	她很大方，捐助了这么大笔钱。
It was the most educational experience I had ever had.	这是我有过的教育意义最大的一次经历。
It was the most extravagant purchase I have ever made.	这是我买过的最奢侈的东西.
It's said that his lameness resulted from an accident.	据说他腿瘸了，是一次事故造成的。
It's silly to drive without fastening one's seat belt.	不系保险带开车就太傻了。
It's time you awake to the realities of the situation.	该是你认识形势的真实情况的时候了。
Jane wrote him a long letter, but he never wrote back.	简给他写了封长信，然而他一直没有回信。
Let's consider the pluses and minuses of moving house.	咱们考虑一下搬家的利弊吧。
Let's not argue the toss we have to accept his choice.	我们不必争论已经决定的事--只好听他的.
Life today is compartmentalized into work and leisure.	现今生活分成工作和闲暇两部分.
Listening to the music has a calming influence on her.	听音乐对她起了一种镇静的作用。
Loss of independencewas a high price to pay for peace.	以丧失独立来换取和平是极高的代价.
Lotus flowers are in full bloom in the pond in summer.	夏季的水塘中，芙蓉盛开。
Make sure to turn off all the lights before going out.	出去之前确认一下所有的灯都关了。
Make sure you read all the small print before signing.	一定要先看清小号字体印刷部分再签字.
Many civilians were killed in the air raids on London.	在伦敦遭空袭时, 有很多老百姓遇难.
Marked by deliberate obscurity of style or expression.	晦涩的以有意使风格或表达上含糊不清为特点的
Mary and I are looking forward very much to the party.	玛丽和我热切盼望晚会的举行。
May the coming New Year bring you joy, love and peace.	愿新年为你带来快乐，友爱和宁静。
Membership in this club is restricted to man under 30.	俱乐部的成员限定在三十岁以下。
Millions of gallons of water are kept back by the dam.	这个堤坝拦住了滔滔的洪水.
Money is being used in place of something more direct.	金钱正在被更直接地用来取代某种东西。
Mother joins (with) me in sending you our best wishes.	我母亲和我一起向你表示美好的祝愿.
Mr.Wu was putting the finishing touches to his report.	吴先生正在对他的汇报作最后的润色。
My father will never give his consent to our marriage.	我父亲决不会同意我们的婚姻的。
My husband reads the newspaper while eating breakfast.	我丈夫一边吃早餐一边读报纸。
My landlord is turning me out at the end of the month.	我的房东让我月底搬走.
News reporters camped upon his doorstep day and night.	一些新闻记者日夜在他门口纠缠不走。
Now many children can be called young but experienced.	现在很多小孩都可以说是少年老成了。

Old as he is, he is none the less vigorous and active.	虽然他年纪很大了, 他仍然精力充沛。
Once in a while, we should take a step back and think.	有时候，我们应该后退一步想一想。
One warm summer evening.../On a warm summer evening...	在夏天一个温暖的夜晚...
One who travels or has traveled, as to distant places.	旅行者一个旅行或已经旅行过的人，如到遥远的地方

Only a few of his kindred were present at his funeral.	只有少数亲戚参加了他的葬礼。
Only faint traces of the tiger's tracks could be seen.	老虎的踪迹仅依稀可见.
Opera houses were packed out whenever she was singing.	她一演唱剧院就满座.
Our armies have retired to regroup for a fresh attack.	我们的部队已经退下来重新整编，以便发动新的进攻。
Our doctor, whom/who we all like very much, is leaving	常给我们看病的那个医生, 我们都非常喜欢他, 他要走了.
Our foreign policy is to coexist with other countries.	我们的外交政策是和其它国家和平共处。
Our frontier guards held up under fierce enemy attack.	我们的边防战士在敌人猛烈进攻下巍然不动。
Our people are suffering at the hands of an oppressor.	我们的人民正在暴君的统治下受苦。
Part of my allowance is kept back to pay for my meals.	我的一部分津贴被扣去付了饭费。
Paying my mortgage was an enormous weight off my mind!	我还了抵押借款, 如释重负!
Peripatetic music teachers visit the school regularly.	兼职音乐教师定期到校授课.
Pets can be a tie when you want to go away on holiday.	要想外出度假时, 宠物会成为牵累.
Philosophy is not a thing one can learn in six months.	哲学不是我们用六个月就能学的东西。
Plagiarists, at least, have the merit of preservation.	抄袭者，起码也有保存文物的功劳。
Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.	简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
Please bear in mind that the train leaves at midnight.	记住, 火车半夜离开。
Please replace the empty ink cartridge in the printer.	请把打印机里面的空的墨粉鼓换掉。
Regulations prescribe that a lawyer draw up the paper.	条文规定必须由律师拟定此公文。
Relating to or being latitudes nearest to the equator.	（纬度）低的纬度接近赤道的，或与之有关的
Rent controls were introduced to prevent profiteering.	为了防止牟取暴利而 实行了租金管制.
Seen from the sky, the river looked like a huge snake.	从天上看下来，这条河像一条巨蛇。
Sentiment in the town is now in favor of a cut in tax.	市民的情绪是赞成减税。
She always stays cool, calm and collected in a crisis.	她在危难时总是很冷静、 镇定如常、 泰然自若.
She ate a light lunch in expectation of a good dinner.	她午饭吃得很少，期待晚饭时饱餐一顿。
She dickered (with the shopkeeper) for the best fruit.	她要买店里最好的水果而（跟店主）讨价还价.
She didn't take (at all) kindly to being called plump.	她（一点都）不喜欢人家说她丰满.
She dominated the meeting by sheer force of character.	她单凭个人气势就镇住了会场。
She gave birth to her first child at twenty years old.	她在二十岁的时候生下第一个孩子。
She gulped nervously, as if the question bothered her.	她紧张地咽了一下，似乎那问题把她难住了。
She has a striking originality in her use of metaphor.	她在运用隐喻方面有独创性。
She holds the world record for long distance swimming.	她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
She inserted a new sheet of paper into the typewriter.	她把一张白纸插入打字机里。
She is always so disagreeable when we ask her to help.	我们请她帮忙时， 她总是那么不友好。
She is astonished at the look of reproach on his face.	她对他脸上露出的责备的神色感到惊讶。
She is sixteen years old but has a mental age of five.	她十六岁, 而智力年龄是五岁.
She loaned her collection of paintings to the gallery.	她把自己收藏的画借给了美术馆。
She paid the repair bill as a salve to her conscience.	她付了维修费以减轻内疚感。
She said she would never set foot in that house again.	她说她再也不愿进入那所房子了。
She wants to do social work when she finishes college.	她打算毕业後从事社会福利工作.
She was at pains to stress the benefits of the scheme.	她极力强调该计画的好处.
She was embarrassed by his exhibitionism at the party.	他在聚会上竭力表现自己使她感到很难堪.
She's been puzzling over his strange letter for weeks.	她几个星期也琢磨不透他那封奇怪的来信.
She's so stupid that you have to spell everything out.	她笨极了, 什麽事都要给她解释得明明白白.
So you fitted that wire through that little hole there	那麽说是你把金属线穿过那个小孔的了, 真灵巧!
Some parts of Africa still remained under colonialism.	非洲有一些地区这时仍然处于殖民主义的统治之下。
Spray starch on the shirt collars before ironing them.	熨衬衫领要先喷些粉浆再熨.
Student numbers have been decimated by cuts in grants.	助学金削减後, 学生人数大大减少.
Such poets as Keats and Shelley wrote Romantic poetry.	有些诗人，如济慈和雪莱，写的是浪漫主义的诗歌。
Sultan is sovereign ruler of certain Muslim countries.	苏丹是某些穆斯林国家的最高统治者。
Surgeons are working round the clock to save his life.	外科医生们正在日夜工作以抢救他的生命。
Tasmania was named after its discoverer, A. J. Tasman.	塔斯曼尼亚岛是以其发现者塔斯曼的名字命名的.
Tears are secreted by an organ under the upper eyelid.	眼泪由上眼睑下面的器官分泌。
Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year.	去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。
Textual analysis identified the author as Shakespeare.	对原文的分析研究鉴定出作者是莎士比亚.
That Indian man is a member of the neighbouring tribe.	那个印第安人是临近部落的成员。
That was the first time that a man walked on the moon.	那是人类第一次在月球上行走。
The Olympic Games commands the attention of the world.	奥运会是举世瞩目的体育比赛。
The President announced the dissolution of Parliament.	总统宣布了议会解散。

The accuser brought an accusation against the accused.	原告起诉了被告。
The actor developed a close rapport with his audience.	该演员与观众建立了密切的关系.

The ancient Romans founded colonies throughout Europe.	古罗马人在整个欧洲建立了殖民地.
The bank receives drafts payable at sight at any time.	银行随时兑换见票即付的汇票。
The beauty of the peach blossom is beyond description.	桃花的美丽难以形容。
The book is called "Guide to the American Literature".	这本书名为《美国文学指南》。

The bus is full. You'll have to wait for the next one.	这班公车客满了。你必须等下一班。

The cooks arrive on camp in advance of the main party.	厨师们在大队人马之前到了野地营地。

The curtains are painted with delicate floral designs.	窗帘上绘有精美的花卉图案。

The enemy raped the country and killed many villagers.	敌人掠夺了这个地区，并且杀害了许多村民。

The forester has explored those tropical rain forests.	那个林务员已经勘测了那些热带雨林。
The frog in the well knows nothing of the great ocean.	【谚】井底之蛙，所见不广。
The garden is well laid out, with many pleasant walks.	这个花园布局很好, 有许多宜人小径.
